manzils.text: Naybilʹsh glorified yavlyaye soboyu odyn khto sklykav Yoho sluzhbovtsya (Muhammad) protyahom nochi, z Svyashchennoyi Masjid (Mecca) do naydalʹshoho mistsya prostration, chyye otochennya my blahoslovyly, aby pokazaty yomu deyakomu z nashykh znakiv. Vin yavlyaye soboyu Slukhacha, Seer
Analohichno, my daly Moses svyate pysannya, ta nadalo tse beacon dlya Ditey Izrayilya shcho: "Vy ne budete vstanovyty budʹ-yakoho idola yak Lord ta Mayster bilya Meni
Vony nashchadky tsykh komu my perevezly z Noah; vin buv appreciative sluzhbovetsʹ
My napravyly Dityam Izrayilya u svyatomu pysanni: "Vy zdiysnyte velyke zlo na zemli, dvichi. Vy destined vpasty u velyki vysotu zukhvalosti
Koly pershyy chas prybuvaye proyty, my poshlemo proty vas sluzhbovtsi u nas khto volodiyutʹ velykym mozhe, ta vony zakhoplyatʹ vashi domivky. Tse ye prorotstvo shcho povynno prybuty proyty
Piznishe, my damo vam perevertayete yikh, ta budete postachaty vas z duzhe bahato bahat·stva ta ditey; my damo vam verkhnyu ruku

Yakshcho vy pratsyuyete righteousness, vy pratsyuyete righteousness dlya vashoho vlasnyy harnyy, ale yakshcho vy zdiysnyuyete z·hubni vy tak do vashoho vlasnoho zbytku. Otzhe, koly druhyy chas prybuvaye proyty, vony zavdadutʹ porazky vam ta vstupayete masjid, tilʹky tomu shcho vony zrobyly pershyy chas. Vony vytrutʹ vsi pryvileyi vy vykonaly
Vashi zlyvy Lorda vy z Yoho myloserdyam. Ale yakshcho vy perekhodyte do porushennya, my protystavymo z retribution. My pryznachyly Gehenna yak zaklyuchnyy abode dlya disbelievers
Tse Quran dovidnyky do krashchoho shlyakhu, ta prynosytʹ harnu novynu do viruyuchiv shcho vedutʹ spravedlyve zhyttya, shcho vony zasluzhyly velyku vynahorodu
Yak dlya tsykh khto disbelieve u U maybutnʹomu, my mayemo hotovi do nykh bolisnyy retribution
lyudsʹke isnuvannya chasto molytʹsya za shchosʹ shcho mozhe zavdaty bilʹ yomu, myslennya shcho vin molytʹsya za shchosʹ harne. Lyudsʹke isnuvannya ye neterplyache

My nadaly nich ta denʹ dva znaku. My zrobyly nichnyy temnyy, ta denʹ osvitleni, shcho vy mozhete shukaty umov z vashoho Lorda tam. Tse takozh vstanovlyuye dlya vas timing systema, ta zasoby rozrakhunku. My takym chynom roz'yasnyuyemo vse dokladno
My zapysaly dolyu kozhnoho lyudsʹku; tse pryv'yazuyetʹsya do yoho shyyi. Na Dni Resurrection my vruchymo yomu zapys tse dostupno
Chytayutʹ vash vlasnyy zapys. Sʹohodni, vy budete dostatni tomu shcho vash vlasnyy reckoner

Whoever keruyetʹsya, keruyetʹsya dlya yoho vlasnyy harnyy, ta whoever ide astray tak do yoho vlasnoho zbytku. Niyakyy hrishnyk ne rodytʹ hrikhy budʹ khto shche. My nikoly ne karayemo bez pershoho posylayuchykh kur'yeru
Yakshcho my musymo vynyshchyty budʹ-yaku spilʹnotu, my dozvolyayemo lideram zdiysnyuyemo prostoru koruptsiyu tam. Odnoho razu vony zasluhovuyutʹ retribution, my vynyshchuyemo tse povnistyu
Bahato heneratsiyi mayemo my vynyshchyly pislya Noah. Vash Lord ye naybilʹsh efektyvnyy u mayutʹ spravu z hrikhy Yoho sluzhbovtsiv; Vin ye tsilkom Cognizant, Seer

Budʹ khto khto vybyraye tse fleeting dovichne tomu shcho yoho priorytet, my kynemosya yomu shcho my vyrishymo daty yomu, todi my zdiysnyuyemo yoho Gehenna, de vin strazhdaye zavzhdy, despised ta zavdav porazky
Yak dlya tsykh khto vybyrayutʹ U maybutnʹomu tomu shcho yikhniy priorytet, ta robota righteousness, toy chas, yak viryachy, yikhni zusyllya budutʹ otsinyuvatysya
Dlya kozhnykh odnikh z nykh my zabezpechuyemo; my zabezpechuyemo dlya tsykh ta tsey z vashykh shchedrosti Lorda. Vashi shchedristʹ Lorda inexhaustible
Prymitka yak my viddaly perevahu deyakym lyudyam nad inshymy (u tsʹomu zhytti). Riznytsi u U maybutnʹomu daleko bilʹshi ta daleko bilʹshe znachnyy
Vy ne budete vstanovyty budʹ-yakoho inshoho boha bilya BOHA, lest vy kinetsʹ despised ta z·hanʹblenyy

Vash Lord ukhvalyv shcho vy ne budete obozhnyuvaty krim Yoho, ta vashi batʹky povynni buty vshanovani. Takyy dovhyy yak abo obydva z nykh zhyvyy, vy budete nikoly ne skazaty yim, "Uff" (naybilʹsh lehkyy zhest dosady), ne budete vy krychyte u nykh; vy budete obrobyty yikh amicably
Ta znyzhuyutʹsya dlya nykh kryla prynyzhennya, ta dobrota, ta kazhutʹ, "Miy Lord, mayutʹ myloserdya na nykh, dlya vony pidnyaly meni z rannʹoho dytynstva
Vash Lord znaye tsilkom vashi nayhlybshi dumky. Yakshcho vy pidtrymuyete righteousness, Vin Forgiver tsykh khto kayutʹsya
Vy budete daty nalezhne alms rodycham, needy, bidnym, ta mandruyuchyy chuzhym, ale ne budete nadmirne, ekstravahantnyy
ekstravahantnyy braty chortiv, ta chort unappreciative yoho Lorda
Navitʹ yakshcho vy povynni prohnaty z nykh, tomu shcho vy peresliduyete myloserdya vashoho Lorda, vy budete obrobyty yikh u naypryyemnishomu sposobi
Vy ne budete utrymaty vashu ruku stingily pryv'yazanyy do vashoyi shyyi, ne budete vy durno vidkryvayete tse, lest vy zakinchuyete osudzheni ta zasmuchenyy
Dlya vashoho Lorda zbilʹshuye zapobizhni zakhody budʹ khto Vin vybyraye, ta zmenshuye tse. Vin tsilkom Cognizant Yoho stvorinʹ, Seer
Vy ne budete ubyty vashykh ditey zavdyaky strakhu bidnosti. My zabezpechuyemo dlya nykh, tak zhe, yak i dlya vas. Ubyvaty yikh ye velykyy zlochyn
Vy ne budete zdiysnyty adyulʹter; tse - velykyy hrikh, ta z·hubna povedinka

Vy ne budete ubyty budʹ-yaku osobu - dlya BOHA zrobyly dovichnyy svyashchennyy - krim na protyazi spravedlyvosti. Yakshcho kozhnyy ubyvayetʹsya nespravedlyvo, todi my dayemo yoho avtorytet spadkoyemtsya prymushuyemo spravedlyvistʹ. Otzhe, vin ne bude perevyshchyty mezhi u avenging vbyvstvo; vin bude dopomahatysya
Vy ne budete torknutysya hroshey syrot krim dlya yikhnʹoho vlasnykh harnykh, do vony dosyahayutʹ zrilosti. Vy budete fulfill vashi domovlenosti, dlya domovlenosti ye velyka vidpovidalʹnistʹ
Vy budete daty povnu miru koly vy torhivlya, ta bude zvazhyty equitably. Tse krashche ta bilʹshe spravedlyvyy
Vy ne budete vyznaty budʹ-yaku informatsiyu, yakshcho ne vy pereviryayete tse dlya sebe. YA dav vam slukhannya, zir, ta mozok, ta vy ye vidpovidalʹni dlya toho, shchob vykorystovuvaty yikh
Vy ne budete pity hordo na zemli - vy ne mozhete rodyly cherez zemlyu, ne mozhete vy budete taki vysoki yak hory
Vsya pohana povedinka zasudzhuyetʹsya vashym Lordom
Tse ye deyake z wisdom nadykhnutyy do vas vashym Lordom. Vy ne budete vstanovyty inshoho boha bilya BOHA, lest vy zakinchuyete u Gehenna, osudzhenyy ta zavdaly porazky
vash Lord dav vam khlopchyky, toy chas, yak dayuchy Sebe anhely tomu shcho dochky?! Yak vy mohly vymovyty takyy blasphemy
My protsytuvaly u tse Quran (vsi riznovydy prykladiv), shcho vony mozhutʹ vzyaty uvahu. Ale tse tilʹky zbilʹshuye yikhnyu antypatiyu
Kazhutʹ, "Yakshcho tam buly budʹ-yaki inshi bohy bilya Yoho, tomu shcho vony zayavlyayutʹ, vony by postaralysya perekynuty Possessor tronu
Vin glorified, Vin znachno nadto exalted, dalekyy nad yikhnimy vyslovamy
Glorifying Yo yavlyayutʹ soboyu sim vsesvit, zemlya, ta kozhnyy u nykh. YE nichoho shcho ne glorify Yo, ale vy ne rozumiyete yikhniy glorification. Vin Clement, Forgiver
Koly vy chytayete Quran, my rozmishchuyemo mizh vamy ta tsymy khto ne viryte v U maybutnʹomu nevydymomu bar'yeru

My rozmishchuyemo shchyty navkolo yikhnikh rozumu, shchob zavazhyty yim z rozuminnya tse, ta deafness u yikhnikh vushrakh. Ta koly vy propoviduyete vash Lord, vykorystovuyuchy Quran vyklyuchno, vony tikayutʹ u antypatiyi
My znayemo tsilkom shcho vony chuyutʹ, koly vony slukhayutʹ vas, ta koly vony roblyatʹ zmovu sekretno - disbelievers kazhutʹ, "Vy sliduyete za bozhevilʹnoyu lyudynoyu
Prymitka yak vony opysuyutʹ vas, ta yak tse vyklykaye yikh zbytysya z shlyakhu shlyakh
Vony skazaly, "Pislya my povertayemo u kistky ta frahmenty, my pryyizhdzhayemo resurrected shche raz
Kazhete, "Navitʹ yakshcho vy povertayete u skeli abo zalizo

Navitʹ yakshcho vy povertayete u budʹ-yakyy riznovyd stvorennya shcho vy vvazhayete nemozhlyvyy." Vony todi skazhutʹ, "Khto prynese nam nazad?" Skazhitʹ, khto utvoryv vas u pershu cherhu." Vony todi skhvylyuyutʹsya yikhni holovy ta kazhutʹ, "Koly shcho budutʹ?" Skazhitʹ, "Mozhlyvo blyzhchyy nizh vy dumayete
denʹ Vin sklykaye vas, vy vidpovidete khvallyachy Yoho, ta vy todi zdiysnyte shcho vy vytrymaly u tse zhyttya ale korotke v toy chas, yak
Rozpovidayutʹ Moyim sluzhbovtsyam obrobyty odyn odnoho u krashchomu mozhlyvomu sposobi, dlya chorta zavzhdy postarayetʹsya zahnaty klyn sered nykh. Bezsumnivno, chort lyudyna naybilʹsh revnyy voroh
Vash Lord znaye vas krashchi. Z·hidno z Yoho znannyam, Vin mozhe zlyva vy z myloserdyam, abo Vin mozhe requite vy. My ne poslaly vam buty yikhniy prybichnyk
Vash Lord yavlyaye soboyu krashchyy knower kozhnoho u nebi ta zemli. Z·hidno z tsym znannyam, my viddaly perevahu deyakym prorokam nad inshymy. Napryklad, my daly David Psalomy
Kazhutʹ, "Blahayutʹ shchob ni idoly vy vstanovyly bilya Yoho." Vony ne mayutʹ potuzhnosti relieve vashi afflictions, ne mozhutʹ vony zavazhayutʹ yim
Navitʹ idoly shcho vony blahayutʹ shukayutʹ shlyakhiv ta zasobiv do yikhnʹoho Lorda. Vony mollyatʹsya za Yoho myloserdya, ta bo Yoho retribution. Bezsumnivno, retribution vashoho Lorda ye merzotnyy
YE ne spilʹnota shcho my ne vynyshchymo pered Dnem Resurrection, abo zapodiyuyemo suvoryy retribution na nykh. Tse vzhe zapysuyetʹsya u knyzi

Shcho zupynyly nas z posylayuchykh dyv shcho poperedni heneratsiyi vidkhylyly yikh. Napryklad, my pokazaly Thamoud verblyuda, hlybokyy (chudo), ale vony porushyly proty tse. My poslaly dyva tilʹky instill povaha

My poinformuvaly vas shcho vash Lord tsilkom kontrolyuye lyudey, ta my nadaly zir shcho my pokazaly vam test dlya lyudey, ta derevo shcho accursed u Quran. My pokazaly yim tverdi dokazy instill povaha u nykh, ale tse tilʹky zbilʹshylo yikhnye porushennya
Koly my skazaly anhelam, "Padayemo prostrate pered Adam," vony upaly prostrate, krim Satan. Vin skazav, ya 'Budu prostrate do odni Vy stvoryuvaly z hryazyuky
Vin skazav, "Z Vy vshanuvaly yoho nahori meni, yakshcho Vy respite meni do Dnya Resurrection, ya ovolodiyu vsima yoho nashchadkamy, krim nechyslennoho
Vin skazav, "Todi idutʹ; vy ta tsey khto sliduyutʹ za vy zakinchytesʹ u Pekli yak vash requital; rivnopravnyy requital

Vy mozhete entice yim z vashym holosom, ta mobilizovuyutʹ vsi vashi syly ta vsi vashi lyudy proty nykh, ta podilyayutʹ u yikhnikh hroshakh ta dityakh, ta obitsyayutʹ yim. Budʹ shcho obitsyanky chorta ne ye bilʹsh nizh ilyuziya
Yak dlya Moyikh sluzhbovtsiv, vy ne mayete enerhetychnoho nad nymy." Vash Lord bude dostatniy tomu shcho prybichnyk
Vash Lord yavlyaye soboyu odyn khto vyklykaye korabelʹ plavaty na okeani, shcho vy mozhete shukaty Yoho shchedrosti. Vin ye Naybilʹsh Myloserdnyy do vas

Yakshcho vy afflicted u seredyni morya, vy zabuvayete vashykh idoliv ta vidverto blahayete Yoho yedynyy. Ale yak tilʹky Vin ryatuye vas do berehu, vy perekhodyte. Diysno, lyudsʹke isnuvannya unappreciative
vy harantuvaly shcho Vin ne vyklykaye zemlyu, na berezi, shchob kovtok vy? Abo, shcho Vin ne poshle na vas tempest, todi vy ne znakhodyte oborontsya

vy harantuvaly shcho Vin ne poverne vam do prymorsʹkoho inshoho razu, todi posylayete na vas shtorm shcho potopaye vas vnaslidok vashoho disbelief? Odnoho razu tse vidbuvayetʹsya, my ne damo vam inshyy shans
My vshanuvaly ditey Adam, ta yakshcho yim z aleyamy na zemli ta u mori. My yakshcho dlya nykh harni umovy, ta my daly yim bilʹshi perevahy nizh bahato nashykh stvorinʹ

denʹ prybude koly my sklykayemo kozhnykh lyudey, razom z yikhnim zapysom. Yak dlya tsykh khto dayutʹsya zapys righteousness, vony prochytayutʹ yikhniy zapys ta ne zaznayutʹ naymenshoyi nespravedlyvosti
Yak dlya tsykh khto zaviska u tse zhyttya, vony budutʹ nevyrazno nadrukovani u U maybutnʹomu; navitʹ bahato hirshyy
Vony mayzhe vidvely vas z apokalipsysa my daly vam. Vony bazhaly, shchob vy vyhotovyly shchosʹ shche, aby roz·hlyanuty vas tovarysh
Yakshcho tse ne shcho my posylyly vas, vy mayzhe nakhylylysya do nykh tilʹky troshky
Maly vy zrobyly,, kotri, my podvoyimo retribution dlya vas u tsʹomu zhytti, ta pislya smerti, ta vy znaydete niyakyy ne dopomohty vam proty nas
Vony mayzhe zaslaly vas z zemli pozbutysya vas, takym chynom vony mohly pereyty yak tilʹky vy lyshaly
Tse ye stiyko vypadkom z vsima kur'yeramy shcho my poslaly pered tym, yak vy, ta vy znaydete shcho nasha systema nikoly ne minyaye

Vy budete zauvazhyty Kontaktnu Molytvu (Salat) koly znyzhennya sontsya z yoho nayvyshchoho vkazuyutʹ na poludenʹ, yak tse rukhy do zakhodu sontsya. Vy budete takozh zauvazhyty (recitation) Quran u svitanku. (Deklamuyuchy) Quran u svitanku zasvidchuyetʹsya
Protyahom nochi, vy budete rozdumuvaty dlya dodatkovoho kredytu, shcho vash Lord mozhe pidnyaty vas do pochesnoho rozryadu
Ta kazhutʹ, "Miy Lord, prypuskayutʹ meni pochesne dopushchennya, ta dozvolene meni vid'yizhdzhayutʹ pochesnyy vid'yizd, ta harantuyutʹ meni vid Vas potuzhna pidtrymka
Proholoshuyutʹ, pravda perevazhala, ta falsehood znykla; falsehood inevitably znyknutʹ
My posylayemo vnyz u Quran likuyuche ta myloserdya dlya viruyuchiv. Odnochasno, tse tilʹky zbilʹshuye wickedness porushnykiv
Koly my blahoslovlyayemo lyudsʹkyy buduchy, vin staye preoccupied ta neuvazhnyy. Ale koly neshchastya vrazhaye yoho, vin povertaye despondent
Kazhutʹ, "Kozhnyy pratsyuye z·hidno z yoho viroyu, ta vash Lord znaye krashchi kotryy keruyutʹsya u pravi shlyakh
Vony prosyatʹ vas pro apokalipsys. Skazhitʹ, "Apokalipsys prybuvaye z moho Lorda. Znannya dane vy khvylyna
Yakshcho my budemo, my mozhemo vzyaty nazad shcho my vidkryly do vas, todi vy ne znaydete oborontsya proty nas
Tse ale myloserdya z vashoho Lorda. Yoho blahoslovennya na vy buly velykym

Kazhutʹ, "Yakshcho vesʹ humans ta vesʹ jinns banded razom aby vyrobyty Quran lyublyatʹ tse, vony mohly nikoly produktsiya budʹ shcho ne lyublyatʹ tse, niyaka materiya skilʹky dopomohy vony ne pozychyly odyn odnym
My protsytuvaly dlya lyudey u tse Quran vsi riznovydy prykladiv, ale naybilʹsh lyudy napolyahayutʹ na disbelieving
Vony skazaly, "My ne povirymo vam yakshcho ne vy vyklykayete vesnu khlynuty z zemli
Abo yakshcho ne vy volodiyete sadom palʹm daty ta vynohradu, z richkamy bihayuchymy cherez tse
Abo yakshcho ne vy vyklykayete masy z neba, tomu shcho vy zayavyly, shchob vpasty na nas. Abo yakshcho ne vy prynosyte BOHU ta anhelam pered nashymy ochamy

Abo yakshcho ne vy volodiyete rozkishnym osobnyakom, abo yakshcho ne vy pidnimayetesya u nebo. Navitʹ yakshcho vy pidnimatysya, my ne povirymo yakshcho ne vy prynosyte knyzhkovi shcho my mozhemo prochytaty." Skazhitʹ, "Slava musytʹ miy Lord. I budʹ-yakyy bilʹsh nizh lyudsʹkyy kur'yer
Shcho zavazhav lyudyam z viryachykh koly kerivnytstvu prybuv yim yikhniy kazhuchomu, BOH posylayutʹ lyudsʹkyy buduchy yak kur'yerom
Kazhemo, "Yakshcho zemlya meshkalysʹ u anhelamy, my by poslaly vnyz yim z neba kur'yer anhelu
Kazhete, "BOH bude dostatniy tomu shcho svidok mizh meni ta vy. Vin tsilkom Cognizant Yoho worshipers, Seer

Whomever dovidnyky BOHA yavlyaye soboyu spravdi kerovanyy. Ta whomever Vin posylaye astray, vy nikoly ne znaydete dlya nykh budʹ-yaki lordy ta volodari bilya Yoho. My sklykayemo yikh na Dni Resurrection forcibly; slipyy, nimyy, ta hlukhyy. Yikhnye pryznachennya Peklo; koly zavhodno yomu okholodzhuye, my zbilʹshymo yikhniy vohonʹ
Takyy yikhniy spravedlyvyy retribution, z vony vidkhylyly nashi vidkryttya. Vony skazaly, "Pislya my povertayemo u kistky ta frahmenty, my pryyizhdzhayemo resurrected u nove stvorennya

vony ne Mohly pobachyty shcho BOH kotryy utvoryv nebo ta zemlyu Mih zmohty utvoryty ti zhe stvorennya? (Shcho) Vin predetermined dlya nykh bezpovorotne zhyttya promizhok? Dosi, disbelievers napolyahayutʹ na disbelieving
Proholoshuyete, "Yakshcho b vy ovolodily moyimy skarbamy Lorda myloserdya, vy by withheld yim, bochy shcho vy mozhete vycherpaty yikh. Lyudsʹke isnuvannya stingy
My pidtrymaly Moses z dev'yatʹma hlybokymy dyvamy - prosymo Ditey Izrayilya. Koly vin poyikhav yim, Pharaoh skazanyy yomu, "ya dumayu shcho vy, Moses, bewitched
Vin skazav, "Vy znayete povnoho dobre shcho niyakoho kozhnoho ne mozhete proyavytysya tsi krim, ochevydno, Lord neba ta zemli. YA dumayu shcho vy, Pharaoh, pryrikayetesʹ
Koly vin peresliduvav yikh, tomu shcho vin peresliduvav yikh z zemli, my potopyly yoho, razom z tsymy khto sided z nym, usi
Ta my skazaly Dityam Izrayilya piznishe, "Idemo zhyvemo u tsyu zemlyu. Koly zaklyuchne prorotstvo prybuvaye proyty, my sklykayemo vas vsikh u odniy hrupi
Pravdyvo, my poslaly tse vnyz, ta z pravdoyu tse prybulo vnyz. My ne poslaly vam krim tomu shcho pred'yavnyk harnoyi novyny, tak zhe, yak i warner
Quran shcho my vidmovylysya vid povilʹno, na poryadku dennomu dlya vas prochytaty tse do lyudey nad dovhym periodom, khocha my poslaly tse vnyz raptovo

Proholoshuyutʹ, "Viryatʹ v tse, abo ne viryatʹ v tse." Tsey khto volodiyutʹ znannyam z poperednikh svyatykh pysannya, koly yomu deklamuyetʹsya yim, vony vypadayutʹ do yikhnikh pidboriddya, prostrating
Yak kazhutʹ, "Slava musytʹ nash Lord. Tse fulfills nashe prorotstvo Lorda
Vony vypadayutʹ na yikhnikh pidboriddi, prostrating ta weeping, dlya tse zbilʹshuye yikhnyu povahu

Kazhutʹ, "Zaklykayutʹ BOHA Yoho, abo zaklykayutʹ Yoho naybilʹsh Dobrozychlyvyy; budʹ-yaka nazva vy vykorystovuyete, yomu nalezhytʹ krashchym nazvam." Vy ne budete vymovyty vashi Kontaktni Molytvy (Salat) nadto holosno, ne sekretno; vykorystayte pomirnyy ton
Ta proholoshuyutʹ: "Pokhvalitʹ musytʹ BOH, khto nikoly ne begotten syn, ne Vin mayutʹ partnera u Yoho tsaryuvanni, ne Vin potrebuyutʹ budʹ-yakoho soyuznyka z slabkosti," ta zbilʹshuyutʹ Yoho stalo
Khvalyatʹ BOHA, khto vidkryv do Yoho sluzhbovtsya tse svyate pysannya, ta vstyhutyy flawless

doskonalyy (svyate pysannya) shchob poperedyty suvoroho retribution z Yoho, ta shchob dostavyty harnu novynu do viruyuchiv shcho vedutʹ spravedlyve zhyttya, shcho vony zarobyly velykodushnu vynahorodu
Prychomu vony perebuyutʹ zavzhdy
Ta shchob poperedyty tsi khto skazaly, "BOH begotten syn
Vony ne volodiyutʹ znannyam pro tse, ne zrobyly yikhnikh batʹkiv. Shcho blasphemy vytikayuchyy z yikhnikh hyrl! Shcho vony vymovlyayutʹ velyka brekhnya
Vy mozhete osudyty sebe vnaslidok yikhnʹoyi vidpovidi do tsiyeyi rozpovidi, ta yikh disbelieving u tse; vy mozhete buty zasmucheni
My prykrasyly vse na zemli, aby vyprobuvaty yikh, ta takym chynom rozriznyuyemo tsi sered nykh kotrykh pratsyuyemo righteousness
Inevitably, my vytremo vse na tse, lyshayuchy tse povnistyu bezplidne
Chomu shche vy dumayete my rozpovidayemo vam pro lyudey pechery, ta nomeriv zv'yazanykh z nymy? Vony ye sered nashykh wondrous znakiv
Koly yunaky vzyaly prytulok u pecheri, vony skazaly, "Nash Lord, ny zlyvy z Vashym myloserdyam, ta blahoslovlyayutʹ nashi spravy z Vashym kerivnytstvom
My todi opechataly yikhni vushra u pecheri dlya predetermined chyslo rokiv
Todi my resurrected yim pobachyty kotri dvokh storin mohly rozrakhuvaty tryvalistʹ yikhnʹoho perebuvannya tam
My rozpovidayemo do vas yikhnya istoriya, pravdyvo. Vony yunaky shcho viryly v yikhnʹomu Lordu, ta my zbilʹshyly yikhnye kerivnytstvo

My posylyly yikhni serdenʹka koly vony vstaly ta proholosheni: "Nash tilʹky Lord yavlyaye soboyu Lorda neba ta zemli. My budemo nikoly ne obozhnyuvaty budʹ- yakoho inshoho boha bilya Yoho. Inakshe, my by daleko astray

Osʹ nashi lyudy vstanovlyuyuchi bohy bilya Yoho. Yakby tilʹky vony mohly zabezpechyty budʹ-yakyy dokaz pidtrymaty yikhniy stend! Khto bilʹshe z·hubnyy nizh khto vyhotovlyaye brekhnyu ta prypysuye yim do BOHA

Z vy bazhayete unyknuty yikh, ta yikhnikh obozhnyuyuchykh za vynyatkom BOHA, dozvolenoho nam berete prytulok u pecheri. Mozhe vasha zlyva Lorda vy z Yoho myloserdyam ta bezposerednimy vamy pravoruch rishennya

Vy mohly pobachyty sontse koly yomu zakinchyly prybuttya z prava storona yikhnʹoyi pechery, ta koly yomu vstanovlyuyete, tse blyshchalo na nykh z vlivo, tomu shcho vony spaly u porozhnechi tut. Tse ye odne z BOZHOHO portents. Whomever dovidnyky BOHA yavlyaye soboyu spravdi kerovanyy, ta whomever Vin posylaye astray, vy ne znaydete dlya nʹoho keruyuchi uchytelem

Vy by podumaly shcho vony probudyatʹ, koly vony spaly faktychno. My povernuly yikh pravoruch storona ta lyshena storona, v toy chas, yak yikhniy sobaka roztyahnuv yoho ozbroyennya u yikhnʹomu midst. Vy podyvylysya na nykh, vy by fled z nykh, vrazhenykh z terorom

Koly my resurrected yim, vony zapytuvaly odyn odnoho, "Yak dovhi vy tut?" "My buly tut odnym dnem abo chastynoyu dnya," vony vidpoviyily. "Vash Lord znaye krashchi yak dovhi my zalyshylysya tut, tak dozvolyayemo nam posylayemo odyn z nas z tsymy hroshamy do mista. Dozvolʹte yomu prynosyatʹ naybilʹsh chyste prodovolʹstvo, ta kupuyutʹ deyaki dlya nas. Dozvolʹte yomu derzhatʹ nyzʹkyy profilʹ, ta prytyahayutʹ niyaku uvahu
Yakshcho vony vidkryvayutʹ vas, vony budutʹ kam'yani vy, abo prymushuyete vas pereyty do yikhnʹoyi relihiyi, todi vy mozhete nikoly ne maty uspikh

My vyklykaly yikh buty vidkryti, shchob dozvolyty kozhnomu znayemo shcho BOZHA obitsyanka ye virna, ta shchob usunuty vesʹ sumniv shchodo kintsya svitu. Lyudy todi posperechalysya sered sebe vidnosno nykh. Deyakyy skazanyy, "Dozvolyayutʹ nam buduyutʹ budynok navkolo nykh." Yikhniy Lord yavlyaye soboyu krashchyy knower pro nykh. Tsey khto perevazhaly skazanyy, "My pobuduyemo mistse obozhnyuyemo navkolo nykh

Deyakyy by skazaly, "Vony buly try; yikhniy sobaka yavlyayuchi soboyu chetverti," v toy chas, yak inshi by skazaly, "P'yatʹ; shostyy buduchy yikhnim sobakoyu," tomu shcho vony zdohadalysya. Inshi skazaly, "Sim," ta eighth yikhniy sobaka. Skazhitʹ, "Miy Lord yavlyayte soboyu krashchyy knower yikhnʹoho chysla." Tilʹky nechyslennyy znav pravylʹne chyslo. Tomu, ne sperechayutʹsya z nymy; tilʹky uz·hodzhuvatysya z nymy. Vy potrebuyete ne radyty budʹ khto pro tse
Vy ne budete skazaty shcho vy zrobyte budʹ shcho u maybutnim

bez toho, shchob kazaty, "BOH bazhayuchyy." Yakshcho vy zabuvayete zrobyty tse, vy povynni nehayno z·hadaty vashoho Lorda ta kazhete, "travenʹ miy Lord keruyete meni shchob zrobyty krashchyy nastupnyy raz
Vony zalyshylysya u yikhniy pecheri try sto rokiv, zbilʹshenykh dev'yatʹma

Kazhutʹ, "BOH yavlyaye soboyu krashchyy knower yak dovhi vony zalyshylysya tam." Vin znaye vsi tayemnytsi u nebi ta zemli. Yoho charivnistyu vy mozhete pobachyty; Yoho charivnistyu vy mozhete pochuty. YE nikhto bilya Yoho tomu shcho Lord ta Mayster, ta Vin nikoly ne ne dozvolyaye budʹ-yakym partneram podilyty u Yoho tsaryuvanni
Vy budete deklamuvaty shcho vidkryvayetʹsya do vas vashoho svyatoho pysannya Lorda. Nichoho ne bude skasuvaty Yoho slova, ta vy ne budete znayty budʹ-yake inshe dzherelo bilya tse

Vy budete prymusyty sebe shchob buty z tsymy khto obozhnyuyutʹ yikhniy denʹ Lorda ta nich, shukayuchy Yoho yedynoho. Ne povernitʹ vashi ochi daleko z nykh, shukayuchy vanities tsʹoho svitu. Ne budete vy pidkoryayetesya odnomu chyyomu sertsyu my nadaly oblivious do nashoho povidomlennya; odyn khto peresliduye yoho vlasni bazhannya, ta chyyi priorytety zmishuyutʹsya

Proholoshuyutʹ: "Tse yavlyaye soboyu pravdu z vashoho Lorda," todi whoever wills dozvolyayutʹ yomu vvazhayutʹ, ta whoever wills dozvolyayutʹ yomu disbelieve. My mayemo hotovi do porushnykiv vohonʹ shcho povnistyu otochytʹ yikh. Koly vony krychatʹ dlya dopomohy, vony budutʹ davatysya ridkyy lyublyatʹ skontsentrovani kyslotnyy shcho scalds oblychchya. Shcho neshchasnyy napiy! Shcho neshchasna dolya
Yak dlya tsykh khto vvazhayutʹ ta vedemo spravedlyve zhyttya, my nikoly ne ne spromozhemosʹ shchob vidshkoduvaty tsym khto pratsyuyutʹ righteousness

Vony zasluzhyly park Eden prychomu richky techiya. Vony budutʹ prykrashatysya tam z brasletamy zolota, ta budutʹ nosyty odyah zelenoho shovka ta oksamytu, ta budutʹ spyratysya na zruchne vbrannya. Shcho dyvovyzhna vynahoroda; shcho dyvovyzhnyy abode
Tsytuyutʹ dlya nykh pryklad dvokh lyudey: my daly odyn z nykh dva park vynohradu, otochenoho palʹmamy daty, ta rozmistyly inshi zerno mizh nymy
Obydva park vyrobyv yikhni zerno svoyechasno, ta velykodushno, dlya my vyklykaly richku pobihty cherez nykh
Yakosʹ, pislya toho yak zbyraty urozhay, vin khvalʹkuvato kazav yoho tovaryshu: "YA ye daleko bilʹshe kvituchyy nizh vy, ta ya komanda bilʹshe povazhayu z lyudey
Koly vin vnis yoho sad, vin obrazyv yoho svoyu dushu kazhuchy, "ya ne dumayu shcho tse kolysʹ zakinchytʹsya

Bilʹshe "toho, ya dumayu tse tse; YA ne dumayu shcho Hodyna (U maybutnʹomu) kolysʹ prybudu proyty. Navitʹ yakshcho ya vertayusʹ do moho Lorda, ya budu (vystachayu rozumnyy) volodiyu rivnym krashchym nad tam
Yoho tovarysh skazav yomu, tomu shcho vin obhovoryv z nym, vy disbelieved u khto utvoryly vas z pylu, todi z tiny kraplya, todi perfected vy u lyudynu
Yak dlya mene, BOH miy Lord, ta ya nikoly ne vstanovlyu budʹ-yakoho inshoho boha krim moho Lorda

Koly vy vnesly vash sad, vy musyly skazaty, `this podanyy yakyy BOH meni (Maa Shaa Allakh). Niyakyy kozhnyy ne volodiye potuzhnistyu krim BOHA (La Quwwata Ellaa Bellaah).' Vy mozhete pobachyty shcho ya volodiyu mensh hroshamy ta menshymy ditʹmy nizh vy
Miy Lord mozhe harantuvaty meni krashche nizh vash sad. Vin mozhe poslaty nasylʹnytsʹkyy shtorm z neba shcho vytyraye vash sad, lyshayuchy tse povnistyu bezplidne
Abo, yoho voda mozhe zanurytysya bilʹsh hlyboka, za mezhamy vashoho prostyahayutʹsya

Diysno, yoho zerno vytyralysʹ, ta vin zakinchyvsya sorrowful, horyuyuchyy yakyy vin vytratyv na tse marno, yak yoho vlasnistʹ lyahla bezplidna. Vin nareshti skazav, "ya bazhayu ya nikoly ne vstanovlyuyu moyu vlasnistʹ yak boh bilya moho Lorda
Niyaka syla na zemli ne mohla dopomohly yomu proty BOHA, ne bulo mozhlyvo dlya nʹoho shchob otrymaty budʹ-yaku dopomohu
Shcho tomu, shcho yedynyy virnyy Lord ta mayster BOH; Vin zabezpechuye krashchu vynahorodu, ta z Nym yavlyaye soboyu krashchu dolyu

Tsytuyemo dlya nykh pryklad tsʹoho dovichnyy tomu shcho voda shcho my posylayemo vnyz z neba vyrobyty zavody zemli, todi vony povertayutʹ u sino shcho duyetʹsya daleko vitrom. BOH vmiye zrobyty vsi rechi
Hroshi ta dity yavlyayutʹ soboyu radistʹ tse zhyttya, ale spravedlyvi pratsi zabezpechuyutʹ vichnu vynahorodu z vashoho Lorda, ta dalekoho krashchoho spodivannya
denʹ prybude koly my vytyrayemo hory, ta vy pobachyte zemlyu bezplidnu. My sklykayemo yikh vsikh, ne vypuskayuchi yedyni odni z nykh
Vony budutʹ predstavlyatysya pered tym, yak vash Lord u ryadi. Vy prybuly do nas tomu shcho osoby, tilʹky tomu shcho my utvoryly vas vykhidno. Diysno, tse ye yake zayavlene vamy nikoly ne vidbudetesʹ

zapys bude pokazuvatysya, ta vy pobachyte vynuvatyy strashnyy yoho zmistu. Vony skazhutʹ, "Prykroshchi do nas. Yak prybuvaty tse knyha lysty nichoho, mali abo velyki, bez toho, shchob ne rakhuvaty tse?" Vony znaydutʹ vse vony zrobyly porodzheni. Vash Lord nikoly ne unjust do budʹ khto

My skazaly anhelam, "Padayemo prostrate pered Adam." Vony upaly prostrate, krim Satan. Vin stav jinn, dlya vin ne pidkoryavsya zamovi Yoho Lorda. Vy budete vybyraty yoho ta yoho nashchadkiv tomu shcho lordy zamistʹ Meni, nezvazhayuchy na te, shcho vony budutʹ ye vashi vorohy? Shcho neshchasna zamina
ya nikoly ne dozvolyv yim zasvidchyty stvorennya neba ta zemli, ne stvorennya sebe. Ne robyty ya dozvolyayu bezputnyy popratsyuvaty u Moyomu korolivstvi

denʹ prybude koly Vin kazhe, "Vyklyk na Moyikh partneriv, komu vy zayavyly zmohty bohy bilya Meni, vony zaklykayutʹ yikh, ale vony ne vidpovidutʹ yim. insurmountable bar'yer vidokremytʹ yikh z odyn odnoho
vynuvatyy pobachatʹ Peklo, ta zdiysnyatʹ shcho vony vpadutʹ u tse. Vony budutʹ ne maty vtechi zvidty
My protsytuvaly u tse Quran kozhnyy riznovyd prykladu, ale lyudsʹke isnuvannya yavlyaye soboyu naybilʹsh argumentative vytvir

Nichoho ne zavazhalo lyudyam z viryachykh, koly kerivnytstva prybulo yim, ta z shukayuchoho forgiveness yikhnʹoho Lorda, krim shcho vony zazhadaly pobachyty toy zhe (riznovyd dyv) yak poperedni heneratsiyi, abo kynuly vyklyk pobachyty retribution zavchasno

My tilʹky posylayemo kur'yeram yak prosto deliverers harnoyi novyny, tak zhe, yak i warners. Tsey khto disbelieve sperechayutʹsya z falsehood shchob zavdaty porazky pravdi, ta vony berutʹ Moyi dokazy ta poperedzhennya marno

Khto ye bilʹshe z·hubnyy nizh khto nahaduyutʹsya pro yikhni dokazy Lorda, todi disregard yim, bez toho, shchob zdiysnyuvaty shcho vony roblyatʹ. Otzhe, my rozmishchuyemo shchyty na yikhnikh serdenʹkakh zavazhyty yim z rozuminnya tse (Quran), ta deafness u yikhnikh vushrakh. Otzhe, niyaka materiya yaki vy shchob keruvaty nymy, vony budutʹ spromozhni nikoly kolysʹ keruvatysya

Dosi, vash Lord yavlyaye soboyu Forgiver, povnyy myloserdya. Yakshcho b Vin zaklykav yikh poyasnyty yikhni spravy, Vin by vynyshchyv yikh pravo tam ta todi. Zamistʹ tsʹoho, Vin daye yim respite do spetsyfichnyy, predetermined chas; todi vony mozhutʹ nikoly ne vtikty
Bahato spilʹnoty my vynyshchyly vnaslidok yikhnikh porushennya; my pryznachyly spetsyfichnyy chas dlya yikhnʹoho znyshchennya
Moses skazanyy yoho sluzhbovtsyu, "ya ne vidpochynu do ya dosyahayu punktu de dva richky zbyrayusya, niyaka materiya yak dovhe tse ne bere
Koly vony dosyahly punktu de vony zbyralysya, vony zabuly yikhnyu rybu, ta tse znaydenyy yoho shlyakh nazad do richky, sneakily
Pislya vony proyshly shcho punkt, vin skazav yoho sluzhbovtsyu, "Dozvolenomu nam mayutʹ lench. Vse tse mandruyuche doskonalo vycherpalo nas

Vin skazav, "Zapam'yatayemo koly my ssily skeleyu nazad tam? YA ne zvernuv uvahu do ryby. Tse yavlyalo soboyu chorta kotryy zroblenoho meni zabuvayutʹ tse, ta tse znaydenyy yoho shlyakh nazad do richky, nezvychayno
(Moses) skazaly, "Shcho yavlyaly soboyu mistse my shukaly." Vony prostezhyly yikhni zakhody nazad
Vony znayshly odyn z nashykh sluzhbovtsiv, komu my blahoslovyly z myloserdyam, ta podarovanym yo z nashoho vlasnoho znannya
Moses skazanyy yomu, ya 'Mozhu proslidkuvaty za vamy, shcho vy 'Mozhete mozhete navchyty meni deyake z znannya ta kerivnytstva 'Mozhete daruvatysya vy
Vin skazav, "Vy ne mozhete lyshytysya v syli buty zi mnoyu
Yak vy mozhete lyshytysya v syli shcho kotryy vy ne rozumiyete
Vin skazav, "Vy znaydete meni, BOH bazhayuchyy, patsiyent. YA ne budu ne pidkoryatysya budʹ-yaki komandni vy dayete meni
Vin skazav, "Yakshcho vy slidkuyete meni, todi vy ne budete poprosyty meni pryblyzno shcho-nebudʹ, yakshcho ne ya vybyrayu kazaty vam pro tse
Takym chynom vony poyikhaly. Koly vony boarded korabelʹ, vin rodyv diru u tse. Vin skazav, vy rodyly diru u tse potopyty yoho lyudey? Vy zdiysnyly shchosʹ strashne
Vin skazav, ya ne skazav shcho vy ne mozhete stend buty zi mnoyu
Vin skazav, "ya zhalkuyu. Ne pokarayte meni dlya moho forgetfulness; ne budʹte nadto rizkyy zi mnoyu
Takym chynom vony poyikhaly. Koly vony zustrily molodoho khlopchyka, vin ubyvav yoho. Vin skazav, "Chomu vy ubyly taku nevynnu osobu, khto ne ubyly inshu osobu? Vy zdiysnyly shchosʹ horrendous
Vin skazav, ya ne kazav vam shcho vy ne mozhete stend buty zi mnoyu
Vin skazav, "Yakshcho ya proshu vas pryblyzno shcho-nebudʹ shche, todi ne derzhyte meni z vamy. Vy pobachyly dosytʹ zakhysni slovo z meni

Takym chynom vony poyikhaly. Koly vony dosyahly pevnoyi spilʹnoty, vony poprosyly lyudey dlya prodovolʹstva, ale vony vidmovylysya do nykh hospodarya. Skoro, vony znayshly stinu bilya shchob rozvalytysya, ta vin fiksuvav tse. Vin skazav, "Vy mohly zazhadaly zarplaty dlya shcho
Vin skazav, "Zaraz my povynni rozdilyty kompaniyu. Ale ya roz'yasnyu do vas vse vy ne mohly lyshytysya v syli
Yak dlya korablya, tse nalezhalo bidnym rybalkam, ta ya zakhotiv nadaty tse defektne. Tam buv korolʹ prybuttya pislya nykh, khto konfiskovuvav kozhnyy korabelʹ, forcibly
Yak dlya khlopchyka, yoho batʹky buly harni viruyuchi, ta my dyvylysya shcho vin zbyravsya yim tyaharya z yoho porushennyam ta disbelief
My willed shcho vash Lord zaminyayemo u yoho mistsi inshyy syn; odyn khto ye krashche u righteousness ta dobroti

Yak dlya stiny, tse nalezhalo dvom syrit·sʹkym khlopchykam po mistu. Pid tse, tam buv skarb shcho nalezhav yim. Tomu, shcho yikhniy batʹko buv spravedlyva lyudyna, vash Lord bazhav, shchob vony pidrosly ta dosyahayutʹ povnoyi syly, todi vytyahayutʹ yikhniy skarb. Takyy myloserdya z vashoho Lorda. YA zhoden z shcho moho vlasnoho volʹovoho aktu. Tse yavlyaye soboyu poyasnennya rechey vy ne mohly lyshytysya v syli
Vony prosyatʹ vas pro Zul-Qarnain. Skazhitʹ, "ya rozpovi do vas deyakykh z yoho istoriyi
My harantuvaly yomu avtorytet na zemli, ta yakshcho yo z vsima riznovydamy zasobiv
Todi, vin peresliduvav odyn shlyakh

Koly vin distavsya dalekyy zakhid, vin znayshov sontse pochynayuchyy prostoryy okean, ta znaydeni lyudy tam. My skazaly, "O Zul-Qarnain, vy mozhete panuvaty tomu shcho vy bazhayete; abo karayutʹ, abo riznovyd yim
Vin skazav, "Yak dlya tsykh khto porushuyutʹ, my pokarayemo yikh; todi, koly vony vertayutʹ do yikhnʹoho Lorda, Vin zdiysnytʹ yikh do bilʹshe retribution
Yak dlya tsykh khto vvazhayutʹ ta vedutʹ spravedlyve zhyttya, vony otrymuyutʹ harnu vynahorodu; my obrobymo yikh budʹ laska
Todi vin peresliduvav inshyy shlyakh
Koly vin dosyah dalekoho skhodu, vin znayshov sontse pidnimayuche na lyudyakh shcho nichoho ne maly do nykh prytulku z tse
Pryrodnʹo, my znaly tsilkom vse vin znayshov
Vin todi peresliduvav inshyy shlyakh
Koly vin distavsya valley mizh dva palisades, vin znayshov lyudey chyya mova bula ledve zrozumila
Vony skazaly, "O Zul-Qarnain, Gog ta Magog corruptors zemli. My mozhemo zaplatyty vam utvoryty bar'yer mizh namy ta yim
Vin skazav, "Miy Lord dav meni velyki shchedristʹ. Yakshcho vy spivpratsyuyete zi mnoyu, ya pobuduyu zaprudu mizh vamy ta yim

Prynosyatʹ meni bezlich zaliza." Odnoho razu vin zapovnyv promizhok mizh dva palisades, vin skazav, "Udar." Odnoho razu yomu buv chervonyy haryachyy, vin skazav, "Dopomoha meni llyutʹ smolu na vershyni tse
Otzhe, vony ne mohly pidnyatysya na tse, ne mohly vony rodyly diry u tse
Vin skazav, "Tse myloserdya z moho Lorda. Koly prorotstvo moho Lorda prybuvaye proyty, Vin vyklykaye zaprudu rozkryshytysya. Prorotstvo moho Lorda pravda
V toy chas, my dozvolymo yim zakhoplyuyemo z odyn odnym, todi rih bude dutysya, ta my sklykayemo yikh vsikh razom
My predstavymo Peklo, na shcho denʹ, do disbelievers
Vony yavlyayutʹ soboyu chyyi ochi nadto veiled pobachyty Moye povidomlennya. Ne mohly vony chuyutʹ
tsey khto disbelieve dumayutʹ shcho vony mozhutʹ pity z vstanovlyuyuchymy Moyimy sluzhbovtsyamy tomu shcho bohy bilya Meni? My mayemo hotove do disbelievers Pekla yak vichnoho abode
Kazhu, ya 'Budu kazaty vam khto nayhirshyy losers
Vony yavlyayutʹ soboyu chyyi pratsi u tsʹomu zhytti povnistyu astray, ale vony dumayutʹ shcho vony roblyatʹ harnyy
Takyy yavlyayutʹ soboyu khto disbelieved u apokalipsysi yikhnʹoho Lorda ta u zustrichayuchomu Yo. Tomu, yikhni pratsi marno; na Dni Resurrection, vony ne mayutʹ vahy
Yikhniy spravedlyvyy requital Peklo, v obmin na yikhniy disbelief, ta dlya toho, shchob vysmiyuvaty Moyi vidkryttya ta Moyi kur'yery
Yak dlya tsykh khto vvazhayutʹ ta vedutʹ spravedlyve zhyttya, vony zasluzhyly blissful Ray yak yikhniy abode
Zavzhdy vony perebuyutʹ tam; vony budutʹ nikoly ne bazhaty budʹ-yakoyi inshoyi zaminy
Kazhemo, "Yakshcho okean chornylo dlya sliv moho Lorda, okean by pobih, pered slovamy moho Lorda bihayemo, navitʹ yakshcho my podvoyuyemo postachannya chornyla

Kazhu, "ya ne vyhlyadayu bilʹsh nizh lyudsʹki yak vy, nadykhayusʹ shcho vash boh ye odyn boh. Tsey khto spodivayutʹsya zustrity yikhnʹoho Lorda bude popratsyuvaty righteousness, ta nikoly ne bude obozhnyuvaty budʹ-yakoho inshoho boha bilya yoho Lorda
Y. `a. S. (Kaaf Haa Yaa `ayn Saad)
rozpovidʹ pro vashe myloserdya Lorda do Yoho sluzhbovtsya Zachariah
Vin zaklykav yoho Lorda, vyklyku tayemnytsi
Vin skazav, "Miy Lord, kistky povernulysya krykhki u moyomu tili, ta moye volossya aflame z sirym. Tomu shcho ya blahayu Vas, moho Lorda, I nikoly ne rozpachu
mene turbuye moyikh zalezhnykh lyudynu piznishe meni, ta moya druzhyna ye sterylʹnym. Harantuyte meni, vid Vas, spadkoyemetsʹ
Dozvolyayutʹ yomu miy spadkoyemetsʹ ta spadkoyemetsʹ Jacob klan, ta roblyatʹ yomu, moyomu Lordu, pryynyatnomu
O Zachariah, my dayemo vam harnu novynu; khlopchyk chyya nazva bude Dzhon (Yahya). My nikoly utvoreni budʹ khto ne lyubymo yoho ranishe
Vin skazav, "Miy Lord, ya budu maty syna nezvazhayuchy na miy sterility druzhyny, ta nezvazhayuchy na moyu staristʹ
Vin skazav, 'Takym "chynom skazav vashoho Lorda: `it ye lehkyy dlya Mene shchob zrobyty. YA utvoryv vas pered shcho, ta vy nichoho
Vin skazav, "Miy Lord, dayutʹ meni znak." Vin skazav, "Vash znak shcho vy ne budete rozmovlyaty z lyudʹmy dlya trʹokh poslidovnykh nochi
Vin vyyshov do yoho rodyny, z sanctuary, ta syhnalizuvav yim: "Rozdumuyte (na Bohu) denʹ ta nich
O Dzhon, vy budete uphold svyate pysannya, sylʹno." My nadaly pravo yomu z wisdom, navitʹ u yoho molodi
Ta (my nadaly pravo yomu z) dobrota z nas ta chystoty, dlya vin buv spravedlyvyy
Vin vshanuvav yoho batʹkiv, ta buv nikoly ne nepokirnyy tyran
Myr budutʹ na yoho denʹ vin narodyvsya, denʹ vin vmyraye, ta denʹ vin resurrected nazad do zhyttya
Z·haduyutʹ u svyatomu pysanni Mary. Vona izolyuvala sebe z yiyi rodyny, u skhidne roztashuvannya
V toy chas, yak bar'yer vidokremyv yiyi z nykh, my poslaly yiy nash Dukh. Vin poyikhav yiy u vyhlyadi lyudsʹkyy
Vona skazala, "ya shukayu prytulku u naybilʹshi Dobrozychlyvi, shcho vy mozhete buty spravedlyvi
Vin skazav, "ya yavlyayu soboyu kur'yera vashoho Lorda, shchob harantuvaty vam chystyy syn
Vona skazala, "Yak mozhe ya mayu syna, koly niyaka lyudyna ne torknulasya meni; YA nikoly ne unchaste
Vin skazav, 'Takym "chynom skazav vashoho Lorda, `it ye lehkyy dlya Mene. My nadayemo yomu znak dlya lyudey, ta myloserdya z nas. Tse ye predestined materiya
Koly vona rodyla yoho, vona izolyuvala sebe do faraway mistsya
protses narodzhennya prybuv yiy korpusom dereva palʹmy. Vona skazala," (ya soromlyusya tak;) ya by khotiv, shchob ya buv mertvyy pered tym, yak tse vidbulosya, ta povnistyu zabute
(nemovlya) zaklykav yiyi z vnyzu yiyi, kazhuchy, "Ne sumuyutʹ. Vash Lord zabezpechyv vas z potokom
Yakshcho vy trusyte korpus tsʹoho dereva palʹmy, tse upustytʹ zrili stroky dlya vas
Hostyatʹsya ta napiy, ta tishatʹsya. Koly vy dyvytesʹ budʹ khto, kazhete, `i zrobyly vow tyshi; YA ne rozmovlyayu sʹohodni do budʹ khto
Vona prybula yiy rodyna, perenesennya yo. Vony skazaly, "O Mary, vy zdiysnyly shchosʹ tse povnistyu nespodivano
O nashchadok Aaron, vash batʹko buv ne pohana lyudyna, ne bula vasha maty unchaste
Vona pointed yomu. Vony skazaly, "Yak my mozhemo rozmovlyaty z nemovlya u crib
(nemovlya rozmovlyalo ta) skazav, "ya ye sluzhbovetsʹ BOHA. Vin dav meni svyate pysannya, ta pryznachylo meni prorok
Vin zrobyv meni blahoslovennyy de zavhodno ya idu, ta nakazanyy meni shchob zauvazhyty Kontaktni Molytvy (Salat) ta obov'yazkova dobrodiynistʹ (Zakat) dlya takoho dovhoho yak ya zhyvoho
ya mushu chestʹ moya maty; Vin ne zrobyv meni nepokirnyy buntivnyk
Ta myr budu na meni denʹ ya narodyvsya, denʹ ya vmyrayu, ta denʹ ya pryyizhdzhayu resurrected
Tse buv Isus, syn Mary, ta tse yavlyaye soboyu pravdu tsiyeyi materiyi, pro kotru vony prodovzhuyutʹsya maty sumniv
Tse ne befit BOH shcho Vin begets syn, Vin glorified. Shchob budʹ shcho zrobyv, Vin prosto kazhe yomu,," ta tse
Vin takozh proholosyv, "BOH miy Lord ta vash Lord; vy budete obozhnyuvaty Yoho yedynyy. Tse yavlyaye soboyu pravo shlyakh
riznomanitni storony posperechalysya sered sebe (vidnosno identychnosti Isusa). Tomu, prykroshchi do tsykh khto disbelieve z vydovyshcha strashnoho dnya
Chekayete do vy chuyete yikh ta bachyte yikh koly vony prybuvayutʹ zustrichatysya z namy. Porushnyky na shcho denʹ bude povnistyu hubytysya
Poperedzhayutʹ yikh pro denʹ remorse, koly vyrok bude vydavatysya. Vony ye povnistyu oblivious; vony ne vvazhayutʹ
My yavlyayemo soboyu khto uspadkovuyemo zemlyu ta kozhnoho na tse; do nas kozhnyy bude vertatysya
Z·haduyutʹ u svyatomu pysanni Abraham; vin buv svyatyy, prorok
Vin skazav yoho batʹkovi, "O miy batʹko, chomu vy obozhnyuyete shcho mozhete ni chuyete, ni dyvytesʹ, ne dopomahayete vam u budʹ-yakomu shlyakhu
O miy batʹko, ya otrymav pevne znannya shcho vy ne otrymaly. Proslidkuyte meni, ta ya budu keruvaty vamy u pryamomu shlyakhu
O miy batʹko, ne obozhnyuyutʹ chorta. Chort protydiyav naybilʹsh Dobrozychlyvomu
O miy batʹko, ya bo lest vy zaznayete retribution z naybilʹshoho Dobrozychlyvoho, todi stavaly soyuznykom chorta
Vin skazav, vy forsaken moyi bohy, O Abraham? Yakshcho ne vy zupynyayete, ya budu kam'yani vy. Lyshitʹ meni yedynyy
Vin skazav, "Myr budete na vas. YA budu blahaty moho Lorda prostyty vas; Vin Naybilʹsh Riznovyd do meni
ya pokynu vas ta bohiv vy obozhnyuyete bilya BOHA. YA budu obozhnyuvaty tilʹky moho Lorda. Blahayuchy moho Lorda vyklyuchno, ya ne mozhu poyikhaty nepravylʹnyy
Tomu, shcho vin pokynuv yikh ta bohiv vony obozhnyuvaly bilya BOHA, my harantuvaly yomu Isaac ta Jacob, ta my zrobyly kozhni z nykh prorok
My showered yim z nashym myloserdyam, ta my harantuvaly yim pochesnu pozytsiyu u istoriyi
Z·haduyutʹ u svyatomu pysanni Moses. Vin buv prysvyachenyy, ta vin buv prorok kur'yera
My zaklykaly yoho z prava storona Pidiymayemosʹ Sinai. My prynesly yomu blyzʹko, shchob prysudyty z nym
Ta my harantuvaly yomu, z nashoho myloserdya, yoho brata Aaron yak prorok
Ta z·haduyutʹ u svyatomu pysanni Ismail. Vin buv pravdyvyy koly vin poobitsyav, ta vin buv prorok kur'yera
Vin zvychayno nakazuvav yoho rodynu zauvazhyty Kontaktni Molytvy (Salat) ta obov'yazkova dobrodiynistʹ (Zakat); vin buv pryynyatnyy do yoho Lorda
Ta z·haduyutʹ u svyatomu pysanni Idris. Vin buv svyatyy, prorok
My pidnyaly yoho do pochesnoho rozryadu

deyako z prorokiv komu BOHA blahoslovlyaye. Vony buly vybrani z chysla nashchadkiv Adam, ta nashchadky tsykh komu my perevezly z Noah, ta nashchadky Abraham ta Izrayilʹ, ta z chysla tsykh komu my kerovanykh ta obranykh. Koly apokalipsys naybilʹsh Dobrozychlyvoho deklamuyutʹsya yim, vony padayutʹ prostrate, weeping
Pislya nykh, Vin zaminyv heneratsiyi kotri zahubyv Kontaktni Molytvy (Salat), ta peresliduvav yikhniy lusts. Vony zaznayutʹ naslidkiv
Tilʹky tsey khto kayutʹsya, vvazhayutʹ, ta vedutʹ spravedlyve zhyttya vnese Ray, bez naymenshoyi nespravedlyvosti
park Eden ochikuyutʹ yikh, yak poobitsyane naybilʹsh Dobrozychlyvym dlya tsykh khto obozhnyuyutʹ Yoho, navitʹ u tayemnosti. Zvychayno, Yoho obitsyanka povynna prybuty proyty
Vony ne pochuyutʹ budʹ-yake bez·hluzdya tam; tilʹky myr. Vony otrymuyutʹ yikhni umovy tam, denʹ ta nich
Takyy Ray; my harantuyemo tse do tsykh sered nashykh sluzhbovtsiv shcho ye spravedlyvi
My ne prybuvayemo vnyz krim komandoyu vashoho Lorda. Yomu nalezhytʹ nashomu mynulomu, nashomu maybutnʹomu, ta vse mizh nymy. Vash Lord ye nikoly ne forgetful
Lord neba ta zemli, ta vse mizh nymy; vy budete obozhnyuvaty Yoho ta steadfastly persevere u obozhnyuyuchomu Yo. Vy znayete budʹ khto khto dorivnyuye Yomu
lyudsʹke isnuvannya zapytuye, "Pislya ya vmyrayu, ya povertayusya do zhyttya
lyudsʹke isnuvannya zabuvayemo shcho my utvoryly yoho vzhe, ta vin nichoho
vashym Lordom, my zvychayno sklykayemo yikh, razom z chortamy, ta zberemo yikh navkolo Pekla, prynyzhenoho
Todi my zberemo z kozhnoyi hrupy naybilʹshyy revnyy oponent naybilʹshoho Dobrozychlyvyy
My znayemo povnyy dobre tsey khto naybilʹsh zasluhovuyemo horyachoho tam
Kozhnyy yedynyy odyn z vy povynni pobachyty tse; tse ye bezpovorotne rishennya vashoho Lorda
Todi my ryatuyemo spravedlyvyy, ta lyshayemo porushnykiv u tse, prynyzhenomu
Koly nashi vidkryttya deklamuyutʹsya yim, yasno, tsey khto disbelieve skazhutʹ tsym khto vvazhayutʹ, 'Kotryy nas bilʹshe kvituchyy? Kotryy nas u bilʹshosti
Bahato heneratsiyi mayemo my vynyshchyly pered tym, yak yim; vony buly bilʹshe potuzhni, ta bilʹshe kvituchyy

Kazhutʹ, "Tsey khto vybyrayutʹ zablukatysya, naybilʹsh Dobrozychlyvyy pryvede yikh na, do vony dyvlyatʹsya shcho musyatʹ obitsyayutʹsya dlya nykh abo retribution abo Hodyna. Tse - koly vony znakhodyatʹ khto diysno pidutʹ hirshyy, ta bilʹsh slabyy u potuzhnosti
BOH zbilʹshuye kerivnytstvo tsykh khto vybyrayutʹ keruvatysya. Dlya harnykh sprav vichno nahorodzhuyutʹsya vashym Lordom, ta prynosyatʹ daleko krashche prybutky
vy vidznachyly khto vidkhylyv nashi vidkryttya todi skazav, 'ya budu davatysya bahat·stvo ta ditey
vin pobachyv maybutnye? Vin vzyav taku zastavu z naybilʹshoho Dobrozychlyvu
Diysno, my zapyshemo shcho vin vymovlyaye, todi zdiysnyuyemo yoho kolysʹ- zbilʹshuyuchyy retribution
Todi my uspadkovuyemo vse vin ovolodiv, ta vin povertayetʹsya do nas vesʹ yedynyy
Vony obozhnyuyutʹ bilya BOHA inshi bohy shcho (vony dumayutʹ) mozhutʹ buty dopomohy yim
Navpaky, vony vidkhylyatʹ yikhniy idolatry, ta budutʹ yikh vorohy
vy ne dyvytesʹ yak my rozv'yazuyemo chortiv na disbelievers shchob zbudyty yikh
Ne budutʹ neterplyachyy; my pidhotovlyayemo dlya nykh deyake pidhotuvannya
denʹ prybude koly my sklykayemo spravedlyvyy pered naybilʹsh Dobrozychlyvym u hrupi
Ta my budemo stado vynuvatyy do Didʹka, shchob buty yikhni vichnyy abode
Niyakyy kozhnyy ne ovolodiye potuzhnistyu intercede, krim tsykh khto prystosovuyutʹsya do zakoniv naybilʹshoho Dobrozychlyvykh
Vony skazaly, "Naybilʹsh Dobrozychlyvyy begotten syn
Vy vymovyly velykyy blasphemy
nebo zbyrayutʹsya shatter, zemlya zbyrayetʹsya slʹoza asunder, ta hory zbyrayutʹsya kryshatʹsya
Tomu, shcho vony zayavlyayutʹ shcho naybilʹsh Dobrozychlyvyy begotten syn
Tse ne befitting naybilʹshyy Dobrozychlyvyy shcho Vin musytʹ beget syn
Kozhnyy yedynyy u nebi ta zemli ye sluzhbovetsʹ naybilʹshoho Dobrozychlyvyy
Vin okhopyv yikh, ta rozrakhuvav yikh
Usi prybudutʹ pered tym, yak Yo na Dni Resurrection tomu shcho osoby
Bezsumnivno, tsey khto vvazhayutʹ ta vedutʹ spravedlyve zhyttya, naybilʹsh Dobrozychlyve bude yim zlyvy z kokhannyam
My takym chynom zrobyly tse (Quran) vysvitlyuvaly u vashomu yazykovi, aby dostavyty harnu novynu do spravedlyvu, ta shchob poperedyty z tse oponenty
Bahato heneratsiyi pered tym, yak yim my vynyshchyly; vy mozhete vidchuty budʹ- yakykh yim, abo mozhete pochuty z nykh budʹ-yakyy zvuk? . H. (Ta Ha)
H
My ne vidkryly Quran do vas, shchob vyklykaty vas budʹ-yaki neharazdy
Tilʹky nahadaty shanoblyvyy
vidkryttya z Creator zemli ta vysokykh neba
Naybilʹsh Dobrozychlyvyy; Vin prypustyv vesʹ avtorytet
Yomu nalezhytʹ vse u nebi, ta zemli, ta vse mizh nymy, ta vse vnyzu zemlya
Chy vy zayavlyayete vashi perekonannya (abo ne) Vin znaye tayemnytsyu, ta shcho ye navitʹ bilʹshe prykhovanyy
BOH: nemaye inshoho boha krim Yoho. Yomu nalezhaty naybilʹshym krasyvym nazvam
vy vidznachyly istoriyu Moses
Koly vin pobachyv vohonʹ, vin skazav yoho rodyni, "Perebuvannyu tut. YA pobachyv vohonʹ. Mozhlyvo ya mozhu prynesty vam deyakym z tse, abo mozhete znayty deyake kerivnytstvo u vohni
Koly vin prybuv yomu, vin buv zaklykanyy, "O, Moses
ya ye vash Lord; usunʹte vashi sandals. Vy ye u svyashchennyy valley, Tuwaa
ya vybrav vas, tak slukhayete shcho vidkryvayetʹsya
ya BOH; nemaye inshoho boha bilya Meni. Vy budete obozhnyuvaty Meni vyklyuchno, ta budete zauvazhyty Kontaktni Molytvy (Salat) shchob zapam'yataty Meni
Hodyna (kinetsʹ svitu) perekonuyetʹsya prybuttya; YA utrymayu tse mayzhe prykhovane, dlya kozhnoyi dushi povynen platytysya za yoho pratsi
Ne budete vidvedenyy zvidty tsymy khto ne viryte v tse - tsey khto peresliduyutʹ yikhni vlasni dumky - lest vy padayete
Yake tse u vashomu pravi ruka, Moses
Vin skazav, "Tse miy personal. YA nakhylyayusya na tse, chereda miy baran z tse, ta ya vykorystovuyu tse dlya inshykh tsiley
Vin skazav, "Kydayutʹ tse vnyz, Moses
Vin kynuv tse vnyz, whereupon tse povernulosya u zvorushlyvoho zmiya
Vin skazav, "Zbyrayutʹ tse; ne zlyakaytesya. My povernemo tse do yoho pokhidnoyi derzhavy
Ta trymayutʹ vashu ruku pid vashym krylom; tse vyyde bile bez plyamy; inshyy dokaz
My takym chynom pokazuyemo vam deyakym z nashoho velykoho portents
Idutʹ Pharaoh, dlya vin porushyv
Vin skazav, "Miy Lord, okholodzhuyutʹ miy nastriy
Ta roblyatʹ tsyu materiyu lehku dlya mene
Ta untie vuzol z moho yazyka
Takym "chynom vony mozhutʹ zrozumity moyu promovu
Ta pryznachayutʹ asystenta dlya mene z moyeyi rodyny
Miy brat Aaron
Posylyuyutʹsya meni z nym
Dozvolyayutʹ yomu miy partner u tsiy materiyi
Shcho my mozhemo glorify Vy chasto
Ta svyatkuyete Vas chasto
Vy Seer nas
Vin skazav, "Vashe prokhannya harantuyetʹsya, O Moses
My blahoslovyly vas inshyy raz
Koly my vidkryly do vashoyi materi shcho my vidkryly

Kazhutʹ: `throw yo u korobku, todi kydayutʹ yoho u richku. Richka kyne yoho na bereh, shchob buty zibrana vorohom Shakhty ta voroha yoho.' YA showered vy z kokhannyam z Meni, ta ya mav vy zrobyly pered Moyim watchful okom

Vasha sestra spryamuvala v yikh ta skazala, `i mozhe kazaty vam pro nyanchachu maty shcho mozhe vzyaty harne pikluvannya yoho.' My takym chynom povernuly vam do vashoyi materi, shcho vona mozhe tishytysya ta mozhe zupynytysya pilkuyucha. Ta koly vy ubyly osobu, my vryatuvaly vas z grievous naslidkiv; diysno my vyprobuvaly vas doskonalo. Vy zalyshylysya roky z lyudʹmy Midyan, ta zaraz vy povernulysya z·hidno z akuratnym planom
ya zrobyv vam tilʹky dlya Mene
Idutʹ z vashym bratom, pidtrymanym Moyimy znakamy, ta ne waver u pam'yatayuchykh Meni
Idutʹ Pharaoh, dlya vin porushyv
Rozmovlyayutʹ z yo krasyvo; vin mozhe vzyaty uvahu, abo mozhe staty shanoblyvym
Vony skazaly, "Nash Lord, my bo lest vin mozhe atakuvaty nas, abo mozhe porushyty
Vin skazav, "Ne boyusya, dlya ya budu z vamy, slukhayuchy ta sposterihayuchyy

Idutʹ yomu ta kazhutʹ, `we ye dva kur'yera z vashoho Lorda. Dozvolʹte Dityam Izrayilya idutʹ. Vy povynni utrymatysya vid peresliduyuchykh yim. My prynosymo znak z vashoho Lorda, ta myr yavlyaye soboyu dolyu tsykh khto zvazhayutʹ na kerivnytstvo
we buv nadykhnutyy shcho retribution bude inevitably afflict tsey khto disbelieve ta prohanyayutʹ
Vin skazav, "Khto ye vash Lord, O Moses
Vin skazav, "Nash Lord yavlyaye soboyu odyn khto harantuvav vse yoho isnuvannya, ta yoho kerivnytstvo
Vin skazav, "Shcho pro mynuli heneratsiyi
Vin skazav, znannya tut ye z moyim Lordom u zapysi. Miy Lord nikoly errs, ne Vin zabuvayutʹ
Vin yavlyaye soboyu odyn khto zrobyv habitable zemli dlya vas, ta paved u tse dorohy dlya vas. Ta Vin posylaye vnyz z vody neba z kotrym my vyroblyayemo bahato riznykh riznovydiv zavodiv
Hostyatʹsya ta pidnimayutʹ vashu domashnu khudobu. Tse - dostatni dokazy dlya tsykh khto volodiyutʹ rozvidkoyu
Z tse my utvoryly vas, u tse my vertayemo vam, ta z tse my prynosymo vam shche raz
My pokazaly yomu vsi nashi dokazy, ale vin disbelieved ta vidmovyvsya
Vin skazav, vy prybuly tut vzyaty nas z nashoyi zemli z vashym zacharuvannyam, O Moses
My bezsumnivno pokazhemo vam podibne zacharuvannya. Tomu, vstanovlyuyemo pryznachennya shcho ni my, ni vy porushyte; u neytralʹnomu mistsi
Vin skazav, "Vash pryznachenyy chas bude denʹ festivities. Dozvolʹte nam vsim zbyrayutʹsya u forenoon
Pharaoh sklykav yoho syly, todi prybuv
Moses skazaly yim, "Prykroshcham do vas. Vy vyhotovlyayete brekhnyu do BOHA boyu ta takym chynom zaznayete Yoho retribution? Taki fabricators bezsumnivno vyydutʹ z ladu
Vony posperechalysya sered sebe, tomu shcho vony prysudyly pryvatno
Vony skazaly, "Tsey dva ni bilʹsh nizh charivnyky kotri ne bazhayutʹ vzyaty vas z vashoyi zemli z yikhnim zacharuvannyam, ta shchob zruynuvaty vash idealʹnyy shlyakh zhyttya
Dozvolyayutʹ nam pohodzhuyutʹsya na odnu skhemu ta oblychchya yim yak z·hurtovanyy front. Peremozhetsʹ sʹohodni bude maty verkhnyu ruku
Vony skazaly, "O Moses, abo vy kydayete, abo my budemo pershi kynuty
Vin skazav, "Vy kydayete." Whereupon, yikhni kanaty ta palky z'yavylysya yomu, vnaslidok yikhnʹoho zacharuvannya, tak, yakby vony rukhalysya
Moses harbored deyakyy strakh
My skazaly, "Ne mayemo strakha. Vy budete perevazhaty
Kydayete shcho vy trymayete u vashomu pravi ruka, ta tse kovtne shcho vony vyhotovyly. Yakyy vyhotovlenyy vony ne ye bilʹsh nizh zamyshlyayuchi charivnyka. Robota charivnyka ne bude maty uspikh
charivnyky upaly prostrate, kazhuchy, "My virymo v Lordu Aaron ta Moses

Vin skazav, vy viryly v yomu bez moho dozvolu? Vin povynen buty vash shef; khto navchyv vas zacharuvannya. YA bezsumnivno roz'yednayu vashi ruky ta nohy na zminnykh storonakh. YA budu crucify vy na korpusakh palʹmy. Vy znaydete kotri nas mozhete zapodiyaty nayhirshyy retribution, ta khto outlasts komu

Vony skazaly, "My ne viddamo perevahu vam nad yasnymy dokazamy shcho prybuly do nas, ta nad khto utvoryv nas. Tomu, pytannya shchob ni vyrok vy bazhayete vydaty. Vy mozhete tilʹky panuvaty u tse nyzʹko dovichnomu
My viryly v nashomu Lordu, shcho Vin mozhe prostyty nas nashi hrikhy, ta mahichni shcho vy prymushuvaly nas vykonaty. BOH daleko krashche ta Everlasting
Budʹ khto khto prybuvaye do yoho Lorda vynuvatoho zaznaye Pekla, prychomu vin nikoly ne vmyraye, ne perebuvannya zhyvi
Yak dlya tsykh khto prybuvaly yomu tomu shcho viruyuchi shcho pryvely spravedlyve zhyttya, vony dosyahayutʹ vysokykh ranhiv
park Eden, vnyzu kotryy richky techiya, bude yikh abode zavzhdy. Takyy yavlyaye soboyu vynahorodu dlya tsykh khto ochyshchayutʹ sebe
My nadykhnuly Moses: "Poveditʹ Moyi sluzhbovtsi, ta straykuyutʹ dlya nykh sukha doroha cherez more. Vy ne budete bo shcho vy mozhete pryyikhaty caught, ne budete vy pilkuyetesya
Pharaoh peresliduvalo yikh z yoho viysʹkom, ale more overwhelmed yim, yak tse destined overwhelm yim
Otzhe, Pharaoh pryzvely do pomylky yoho lyudy; vin ne keruvav nymy
O Dity Izrayilya, my dostavyly vam z vashoho voroha, sklykani vy pravoruch storona Pidiymayetesya Sinai, ta my poslaly vnyz do vas manna ta quails
Hostymosʹ z harnykh rechey my yakshcho dlya vas, ta ne porushuyete, lest vy zaznayete Moho hnivu. Whoever zaznaye Moho hnivu vpav
ya perekonuyusʹ Probachayutʹ dlya tsykh khto kayutʹsya, vvazhayu, vedu spravedlyve zhyttya, ta steadfastly zalyshayusya kerovanyy
Chomu vy kynulysya daleko z vashykh lyudey, O Moses
Vin skazav, "Vony blyzʹki pozadu meni. YA kynuvsya do Vas miy Lord, shcho Vy mozhete buty zadovolʹneni
Vin skazav, "My postavyly vashykh lyudey do testu pislya vas vlivo, ale Samarian pryzvely do pomylky yim

Moses povernulysya do yoho lyudey, serdytykh ta rozcharovanykh, kazhuchy, "O moyi lyudy, vash Lord ne poobitsyav vam harnu obitsyanku? Vy ne mohly zachekaty? Vy zakhotily zaznaty hnivu z vashoho Lorda? Tse chomu vy rozbyly vash dohovir zi mnoyu
Vony skazaly, "My ne rozbyly nash dohovir z vamy na meti. Ale my buly navantazheni vnyz z yuvelirnymy vyrobamy, ta buly vyrisheni shchob kynuty nashi vantazhi. Tse proponuyetʹsya shcho Samarian
Vin vyrobyv dlya nykh sculpted lytka, zavershuyutʹ z lytkoyu zvuk. Vony skazaly, "Tse ye vash boh, ta boh Moses." Otzhe, vin zabuv
vony ne Mohly pobachyty shcho tse ni vidpovidalo yim, ni Mohlo voloditysya budʹ-yakoyu potuzhnistyu do nykh shkody, abo yim vyhody
Ta Aaron kazaly yim, "O moyi lyudy, tse ye test dlya vas. Vash tilʹky Lord yavlyaye soboyu Naybilʹsh Dobrozychlyvyy, tak slidkuyutʹ meni, ta pidkoryayutʹsya moyim komandam
Vony skazaly, "My prodovzhymo obozhnyuvaty tse, do Moses povertayetʹsya
(Moses) skazalo, "O Aaron, shcho tse shcho zavazhalo vam, koly vy pobachyly yikh zablukayetesya
z nastupnykh moyikh zamov? Vy protydiyaly meni
Vin skazav, "O syn moyeyi materi; ne vytashchitʹ meni moyeyu borodoyu ta moyeyu holovoyu. YA zlyakavsya shcho vy mozhete skazaty, `you rozdilyly Ditey Izrayilya, ta ne pidkoryalysya moyim zamovam
Vin skazav, "U chomu sprava z vamy, O Samarian

Vin skazav, "ya pobachyv yaki vony ne mohly pobachyty. YA skhopyv fistful (pylu) z mistsya de kur'yer lyshyvsya v syli, ta vykorystav tse (shchob zmishatysya u zolotystu lytku). Tse shcho miy rozum nadykhav meni shchob zrobyty

Vin skazav, "Todi idutʹ, ta, vsyudy vashe zhyttya, ne navitʹ prybuvayutʹ zakryvayutʹ. Vy mayete pryznachenyy chas (dlya vashoho zaklyuchnoho vyroku) shcho vy mozhete nikoly ne unyknuty. Podyvitʹsya na vashoho boha shcho vy zvychayno obozhnyuvaly; my spalymo tse ta kydayemo tse u more, shchob zalyshytysya vnyz tam zavzhdy
Vash tilʹky boh BOH; poruch z komu nemaye inshoho boha. Yoho znannya okhoplyuye vsi rechi
My takym chynom rozpovidayemo do vas deyaka novyna z mynulykh heneratsiy. My vidkryly do vas povidomlennya z nas
Tsey khto disregard tse rodytʹ vantazh (hrikhiv) na Dni Resurrection
Vichno vony perebuyutʹ tam; shcho neshchasnyy vantazh na Dni Resurrection
Shcho yavlyaye soboyu denʹ koly rih duyetʹsya, ta my sklykayemo vynuvatyy na shcho denʹ syniy
Shepochutʹ sered sebe, vony skazhutʹ, "Vy zalyshylysya (u pershomu zhytti) ni bilʹsh nizh desyatʹ dniv
My znayemo tsilkom yikhni vyslovy. Naybilʹsh tochnyy sered nykh skazhete, "Vy ne zalyshylysya bilʹsh nizh denʹ
Vony prosyatʹ vas pro hory. Skazhitʹ, "Miy Lord vyt yikh
Vin lyshytʹ yikh lyublyatʹ bezplidnu, kvartyru zemlya
Ne navitʹ naybilʹsh lehkyy pahorb bude vy dyvytesʹ tam, ne opuskayetesya
Na shcho denʹ, kozhnyy proslidkuye caller, bez naybilʹsh lehkoho vidkhylennya. Vsi zvuky budutʹ zaspokoyuvatysya pered naybilʹsh Dobrozychlyvym; vy nichoho ne pochuyete ale shepit
Na shcho denʹ, zastupnytstvo bude daremne, krim dlya tsykh dozvolenoho naybilʹshym Dobrozychlyvyy, ta chyyi vyslovy prystosovuyutʹsya do Yoho budutʹ
Vin znaye yikhnye mynule ta yikhnye maybutnye, v toy chas, yak nikhto ne okhoplyuye Yoho znannya
Vsi oblychchya pidkoryatʹsya do Zhyvyy, Vichnyy, ta tsey khto burdened yikhnimy porushennyam vyyde z ladu
Yak dlya tsykh khto popratsyuvaly righteousness, toy chas, yak viryachy, vony budutʹ ne maty strakha nespravedlyvosti abo neshchastya
My takym chynom vidkryly tse, arabsʹke Quran, ta my protsytuvaly u tse vsi riznovydy prorotstva, shcho vony mozhutʹ buty vryatovani, abo tse mozhe vyklykaty yikh vzyaty uvahu
Naybilʹsh Exalted BOH, yedynyy virnyy Korolʹ. Ne kynitʹsya u vymovlyayuchyy Quran pered tym, yak tse vidkryvayetʹsya do vas, ta kazhete, "Miy Lord, zbilʹshuyete moye znannya
My vyprobuvaly Adam ranishe, ale vin zabuv, ta my znayshly yoho indecisive
Vidklykannya shcho my skazaly anhelam, "Padayemo prostrate pered Adam." Vony upaly prostrate, krim Satan; vin vidmovyvsya
My todi skazaly, "O Adam, tse ye voroh vas ta vashoyi druzhyny. Ne dozvolʹte yomu evict vy z Rayu, lest vy stayete neshchasnym
Vy harantuyetesʹ nikoly do holodu tam, ne ne idete nezakhyshcheni
Ne budete vy spraha tam, ne strazhdayete z budʹ-yakoho tepla
Ale chort proshepotiv yomu, kazhuchy, "O Adam, dozvolenyy meni pokaz vy derevo vichnosti ta unending tsaryuvannya
Vony hostylysya z tse, whereupon yikhni orhanizatsiyi staly pomitnym yim, ta vony postaralysya nakryty sebe z lystamy Rayu. Adam takym chynom ne pidkoryavsya yoho Lordu, ta vpav
Z·hodom, yoho Lord vybrav yoho, vykuplenoho yoho, ta kerovanoho yoho

Vin skazav, "Znyzhayetesya zvidty, vsi vy. Vy vorohy odyn odnym. Koly kerivnytstvo prybuvaye do vas z Meni, budʹ khto khto sliduye za Moyim kerivnytstvom ne zablukayetʹsya, ne zaznayete budʹ-yakoho neshchastya
Yak dlya khto disregards Moye povidomlennya, vin bude maty amiserable zhyttya, ta my resurrect yo, na Dni Resurrection, slipoho
Vin skazhe, "Miy Lord, chomu vy sklykaly meni slipyy, koly ya zvychayno buv seer
Vin skazhe, 'Tomu, "shcho vy zabuly nashi vidkryttya koly vony prybuly do vas, vy zaraz zabuvayetesʹ
My takym chynom requite tsey khto porushuyutʹ ta vidmovlyayemosʹ viryty v apokalipsysu yikhnʹoho Lorda. retribution u U maybutnʹomu daleko hirshyy ta everlasting
tse kolysʹ traplyayetʹsya yim skilʹky poperednikh heneratsiy my vynyshchyly? Vony zaraz zakhodyatʹ domivky tsykh pered tym, yak yim. Tse - znaky dlya tsykh khto volodiyutʹ rozvidkoyu
Yakshcho b tse bulo ne dlya vashoho Lorda predetermined plan, vony by sudylysʹ nehayno

Tomu, patsiyent pered yikhnimy vyslovamy, ta pokhvala ta glorify vash Lord pered skhodom sontsya ta pered zakhodom sontsya. Ta pid chas nochi glorify Yo, tak zhe, yak i u obydva kintsyakh dnya, shcho vy mozhete tishytysya

Ta ne covet shcho my podaruvaly budʹ-yakykh inshykh lyudey. Takyy tymchasovi ornamenty tse zhyttya, tym samym my stavymo yikh do testu. Shcho vash Lord zabezpechuye dlya vy daleko krashche, ta everlasting

Vy budete nakazaty vashu rodynu zauvazhyty kontaktni molytvy (Salat), ta steadfastly persevere pry tsʹomu. My ne prosymo vas dlya budʹ-yakykh umov; my yavlyayemo soboyu khto zabezpechuyemo dlya vas. Ostatochnyy triumf nalezhytʹ spravedlyvyy
Vony skazaly, "Yakshcho vin mih tilʹky pokazaty nam chudo z yoho Lorda!" Vony ne otrymaly dostatni dyva z poperednimy povidomlennyamy
Maly my vynyshchyly yikh pered tse, vony by skazaly, "Nash Lord, mav Vy poslaly kur'yeru do nas, my by proslidkuvaly za Vashymy vidkryttyamy, ta by unyknuly tsʹoho soromu ta prynyzhennya
Kazhutʹ, "Vesʹ nas chekayutʹ, tak chekayutʹ; vy bezsumnivno znaydete khto ye na pravylʹnomu shlyakhu, ta khto spravdi keruyetesʹ
Shvydke nablyzhennya yavlyaye soboyu rozrakhunok dlya lyudey, ale vony ye oblivious, neprykhylʹnyy
Koly dokaz prybuvaye yim z yikhnʹoho Lorda, shcho ye novi, vony slukhayutʹ tse neuvazhno
Yikhni rozum ye neuvazhni. Ta porushnyky prysudzhuyutʹ sekretno: vin ne tilʹky lyudsʹkyy vyhlyadayuchyy yak vy? Chy ne mohly b vy vyznaty zacharuvannya shcho ye prysutniy do vas
Vin skazav, "Miy Lord znaye kozhnyy podumanoho u nebesakh ta zemli. Vin yavlyaye soboyu Slukhacha, Omniscient
Vony navitʹ skazaly, "Hallucinations," "Vin vstyh," ta, "Vin ye poet. Dozvolʹte yomu pokazuyutʹ nam chudo lyublyatʹ tsi poperednikh kur'yeriv
My nikoly ne vynyshchyly viryachi spilʹnoti ranishe. Tsi viruyuchi lyudey
My ne poslaly pered tym, yak vy krim lyudey komu my nadykhnuly. Poprositʹ tsi khto znayte svyate pysannya, yakshcho vy ne znayete
My ne daly yim orhanizatsiyi shcho ne hostylysya, ne vony nevmyrushchi
My vykonaly nashu obitsyanku yim; my vryatuvaly yikh razom z whomever my willed, ta vynyshchyly porushnykiv
My poslaly vnyz do vas svyate pysannya mistyache vashe povidomlennya. Vy ne rozumiyete
Bahato spilʹnoty my zakinchylysya vnaslidok yikhnʹoho porushennya, ta my zaminyly inshykh lyudey u yikhnʹomu mistsi
Koly nash requital prybuv proyty, vony startuvaly pobihty
Ne bihayete, ta povernutysya do vashykh rozkoshi ta vashykh osobnyakiv, dlya vy povynni buty vlashtovani pidzvitnyy
Vony skazaly, "Prykroshchi do nas. My buly diysno bezputni
Tse prodovzhuvalosya buty yikhnye proholoshennya, do my povnistyu vyterly yikh
My ne utvoryly nebo ta zemlyu, ta vse mizh nymy tilʹky dlya rozvahy
Yakshcho my potrebuvaly rozvahy, my mohly zapochatkuvaly tse bez budʹ-yakoho tse, yakshcho shcho potrebuyetʹsya yaki my shchob zrobyty
Zamistʹ tsʹoho, tse - nash plan pidtrymaty pravdu proty falsehood, aby zavdaty porazky tse. Prykroshchi do vas dlya vysloviv vy vymovlyayete
Yomu nalezhytʹ kozhnomu u nebi ta zemli, ta tsiy u Yo ye nikoly nadto zukhvalyy ne obozhnyuvaty Yoho, ne roblyatʹ vony kolysʹ waver
Vony glorify nich ta denʹ, bez kolysʹ stomlyuyuchoho
vony znayshly bohiv na zemli khto mozhe utvoryty
Yakshcho tam buly u nykh (nebo ta zemlya) inshi bohy bilya BOHA, tam by khaos. Slava musytʹ BOH; Lord z absolyutnym avtorytetom. Vin ye vysokyy nad yikhnimy pretenziyamy
Vin nikoly ne buty poproshenyy pro budʹ shcho Vin, v toy chas, yak vsi inshi dopytuyutʹsya

vony znayshly inshykh bohiv bilya Yoho? Skazhitʹ, "Pokaz meni vash dokaz. Tse yavlyaye soboyu povidomlennya do moyeyi heneratsiyi, consummating vsi poperedni povidomlennya." Diysno, bilʹshistʹ yikh ne vyznayutʹ pravdu; tse chomu vony ye tak vorozhi
My ne poslaly budʹ-yakomu kur'yeru pered tym, yak vy krim z natkhnennyam: "Nemaye boha krim Meni; vy budete obozhnyuvaty Meni yedynyy
Dosi, vony skazaly, "Naybilʹsh Dobrozychlyvyy begotten syn!" Slava musytʹ Yo. Vesʹ (kur'yery) (Yoho) vshanuvav sluzhbovtsiv
Vony nikoly ne rozmovlyayutʹ na yikhnʹomu vlasnyy, ta vony chitko sliduyutʹ za Yoho komandamy
Vin znaye yikhnye maybutnye ta yikhnye mynule. Vony ne intercede, krim dlya tsykh vzhe vyznanykh Yo, ta vony pilkuyutʹsya pro yikhni vlasni shyyi
Yakshcho budʹ-yaki pretenziyi yikh buty boh bilya Yoho, my requite yo z Peklom; my takym chynom requite bezputni
unbelievers ne zdiysnyuyutʹ shcho nebesa ta zemlya zvychayno bula odni tverdykh masovykh shcho my pidirvaly u isnuvannya? Ta z vodnykh my zrobyly vsi zhyvi rechi. Vony by vvazhayutʹ
Ta my rozmistyly na zemli stabilizers, lest tse padinnya z nymy, ta my rozmistyly pryami dorohy tam, shcho vony mozhutʹ keruvatysya
Ta my nadaly nebo pylʹnuvaly stelyu. Dosi, vony ye povnistyu oblivious do vsʹoho portents tam
Ta Vin yavlyaye soboyu odyn khto utvoryv nich ta denʹ, ta sontse ta misyatsʹ; kozhnyy plavayuchyy u yoho vlasniy orbiti
My nikoly ne ukhvalyly immortality dlya budʹ khto pered tym, yak vy; vy musyte vmerty, musyte ye vony nevmyrushchi
Kozhna lyudyna pokushtuye smertʹ, pislya my stavymo vas do testu cherez neshchastya ta dobrobut, todi do nas vy ostatochno vertayete
Koly tsey khto disbelieve bachyte vas, vony ridicule vy: tsey khto vyklyky vashi bohy?" Tym chasom, vony zalyshayutʹsya povnistyu neuvazhni povidomlennya z naybilʹshoho Dobrozychlyvoho
lyudsʹke isnuvannya ye neterplyache vid narodzhennya. YA inevitably pokazhu vam Moyi znaky; ne budʹte u takiy pospishnosti
Vony vyklyk: "De shcho (retribution), yakshcho vy pravdyvi
Yakby tilʹky tsey khto disbelieve mih peredbachyty sebe koly vony probuyutʹ do opiky vohonʹ - yikhni oblychchya ta yikhni spyny! Niyakyy kozhnyy ne dopomozhe yim todi
Diysno, tse prybude yim raptom, ta vony budutʹ nadzvychayno ohlushatysya. Vony mozhutʹ ni unykayutʹ tse, ni mozhutʹ vony otrymuyutʹ budʹ-yakyy respite
Kur'yery pered tym, yak vy ridiculed, ta, otzhe, tsey khto ridiculed yim zaznaly retribution dlya yikh ridiculing
Kazhete, "Khto mozhe zakhystyty vas z naybilʹsh Dobrozychlyvoyi protyahom nochi abo pid chas dnya?" Diysno, vony ye povnistyu oblivious do povidomlennya yikhnʹoho Lorda
vony mayutʹ bohiv shcho mozhutʹ zakhystyty yikh z nas? Vony ne mozhutʹ navitʹ dopomohty sebe. Ne mozhutʹ vony suprovodzhuyutʹ odyn odnym koly vony sklykayutʹsya shchob zustrichatysya z namy
My zabezpechyly dlya tsykh lyudey ta yikhnikh predkiv, do starosti. Vony ne dyvlyatʹsya shcho kozhnoho dnya na zemli prynosytʹ yim blyzhchym do kintsya? Vony mozhutʹ anulyuvaty tsey protses
Kazhu, "ya poperedzhayu vas z·hidno z bozhestvennym natkhnennyam." Ale, hlukhyy ne mozhutʹ pochuty vyklyk, koly vony poperedzhayutʹsya
Koly zrazok vashoho retribution Lorda afflicts yim, vony lehko kazhutʹ, "My buly diysno bezputni

My vstanovymo vahy spravedlyvosti na Dni Resurrection. Niyaka dusha ne zaznaye naymenshoyi nespravedlyvosti. Navitʹ ekvivalent nasinnya hirchytsyi bude poyasnyuvatysya. My yavlyayemo soboyu naybilʹsh efektyvnyy reckoners
My daly Moses ta Aaron Statut Knyha, beacon, ta reminder dlya spravedlyva
kotra povaha yikhniy Lord, navitʹ koly vyklyuchno u yikhniy tayemnosti, ta vony pilkuyutʹsya pro Hodynu
Tse nadto ye blahoslovennyy reminder shcho my poslaly vnyz. Vy zaperechuyete tse
Pered shcho, my harantuvaly Abraham yoho kerivnytstvo ta rozuminnya, dlya my znaly tsilkom yoho
Vin skazav yoho batʹkovi ta yoho lyudyam, "Yaki tsi statuyi kotryy vy prysvyachuyete sebe
Vony skazaly, "My znayshly nashykh batʹkiv obozhnyuyuchi yim
Vin skazav, "Diysno, vy ta vashi batʹky poyikhaly povnistyu astray
Vony skazaly, vy rozpovidayete nam pravdu, abo hrayuchi vy
Vin skazav, "Vash tilʹky Lord yavlyaye soboyu Lorda neba ta zemli, khto utvoryv yikh. Tse yavlyaye soboyu svidchennya kotryy ya dayu svidchennya
ya prysyahayu BOHOM, ya mayu plan maty spravu z vashi statuyi, yak tilʹky vy lyshayete
Vin rozbyv yikh u shmatky, krim protyahom velykoho, shcho vony mozhutʹ zvernutysya do tse
Vony skazaly, "Whoever zrobyly tse do nashykh bohiv ye diysno porushnyk
Vony skazaly, "My pochuly molodʹ zahrozhuyemo yim; vin zaklykayetʹsya Abraham
Vony skazaly, "Prynosyatʹ yomu pered ochamy vsikh lyudey, shcho vony mozhutʹ davaty svidchennya
Vony skazaly, vy zrobyly tse do nashykh bohiv, O Abraham
Vin skazav, "Tse shcho velykyy odyn khto zrobyv tse. Poyidʹte prosyatʹ yikh, yakshcho vony mozhutʹ rozmovlyaty
Vony buly zakhopleni znenatsʹka, ta buly skazani sebe, "Diysno, vy yavlyayete soboyu khto porushuvav
Dosi, vony pereyshly do yikhnikh starykh idey: "Vy znayete povnyy dobre shcho tsey ne mozhete rozmovlyaty
Vin skazav, vy todi obozhnyuyete bilya BOHA shcho volodiye niyakoyu potuzhnistyu do vyhody vy abo shkoda vy
Vy zaznaly soromu obozhnyuyuchy idoliv bilya BOHA. Vy ne rozumiyete
Vony skazaly, "Horyatʹ yo ta pidtrymuyutʹ vashykh bohiv, yakshcho tse ye shcho vy vyrishyte zrobyty
My skazaly, "O vohonʹ, budemo prokholodnyy ta seyf dlya Abraham
Otzhe, vony zamyslyly proty yoho, ale my zrobyly yim losers
My vryatuvaly yoho, ta my vryatuvaly Dolyu, do zemelʹnykh shcho my blahoslovyly dlya vsikh lyudey
Ta my harantuvaly yomu Isaac ta Jacob yak darunok, ta my zrobyly yim obydva spravedlyvym

My zrobyly yim imams kotri kerovanyy u vidpovidnosti do nashykh zapovidey, ta my navchyly yikh yak popratsyuvaty righteousness, ta yak zauvazhyty Kontaktni Molytvy (Salat) ta obov'yazkova dobrodiynistʹ (Zakat). Do nas, vony buly prysvyacheni worshipers
Yak dlya Doli, my harantuvaly yomu wisdom ta znannya, ta my vryatuvaly yoho z spilʹnoty shcho practiced abominations; vony buly bezputni ta z·hubni lyudy
My dopuskaly yoho u nashe myloserdya, dlya vin buv spravedlyvyy
Ta, pered shcho, Noah zaklykani ta my vidpovily yomu. My vryatuvaly yoho ta yoho rodynu z velykoho lykha
My pidtrymaly yoho proty lyudey kotrykh vidkhylyly nashi vidkryttya. Vony buly z·hubni lyudy, takym chynom my potopyly yikh vsikh
Ta David ta Solomon, koly vony odnoho razu panuvaly shcho stosuyetʹsya zerna khtosʹ tse bulo zruynovani inshym baranom, my zasvidchyly yikhniy vyrok
My harantuvaly Solomon pravylʹne rozuminnya, khoch my nadaly pravo i z nykh z wisdom i znannya. My zdiysnyly hory sluzhyty David u glorifying (Boh), tak zhe, yak i ptakhy. Tse ye yaki my
Ta my navchyly yoho maysternistʹ roblyachykh shchytiv zakhystyty vas u viyni. Vy todi vdyachni

Dlya Solomon, my zdiysnyly viter gusting ta duyuchyy u yoho rozporyadzhenni. Vin mih napravyty tse tomu shcho vin pobazhav, shchob ni vysadytysya vin vybrav, ta my blahoslovlyaly taku zemlyu dlya nʹoho. My znayemo tsilkom vsi rechi
Ta chortiv tam buv tsey khto by pirnuv dlya nʹoho (shchob zibraty urozhay more), abo shchob ni shche vin nakazav yim zrobyty. My zdiysnyly yikh u yoho sluzhbi
Ta Robota blahala yoho Lorda: "Neshchastya befallen meni, ta, vsikh myloserdnykh, Vy yavlyayete soboyu Naybilʹsh Myloserdnyy
My vidpovily yomu, relieved yoho neshchastya, ta restavruvalo yoho rodynu dlya nʹoho, navitʹ dvichi yak znachno. Tse bulo myloserdya z nas, ta reminder dlya worshipers
Takozh, Ismail, Idris, Zal-Kifl; vesʹ steadfast, patsiyent
My dopuskaly yikh u nashe myloserdya, dlya vony buly spravedlyvi

Ta Zan-Poludenʹ (Jonah, z `n' u yoho nazvi"), pokynulo yoho misiyu u protesti, myslennya shcho my ne mohly prokontrolyuvaty yoho. Vin zakinchyvsya blahayuchyy z temryavy (velykoho shlunku ryby): "Nemaye boha za vynyatkom Vas. Vy glorified. YA zdiysnyv velykyy hrikh
My vidpovily yomu, ta vryatuvaly yoho z kryzy; my takym chynom ryatuyemo viruyuchiv
Ta Zachariah blahav yoho Lorda: "Miy Lord, ne derzhyte meni bez spadkoyemtsya, khoch Vy yavlyayete soboyu krashchyy inheritor

My vidpovily yomu ta harantuvaly yomu Dzhon; my zafiksuvaly yoho druzhynu dlya nʹoho. Shcho tomu, shcho vony zvychayno hasten popratsyuvaty righteousness, ta blahav nas u sytuatsiyakh radosti, tak zhe, yak i strakha. Do nas, vony buly shanoblyvi
Yak dlya khto pidtrymav yiyi virginity, my poduly u yiyi z nashoho dukh, ta otzhe, my zrobyly yiy ta yiyi synu portent dlya vsʹoho svitu
Vash congregation ale odyn congregation, ta I vyklyuchno ye vash Lord; vy budete obozhnyuvaty Meni yedynyy
Ale, vony rozdilyly sebe u dysputuyuchi relihiyu. Usi povernutʹsya do nas (dlya vyroku)
Yak dlya tsykh khto pratsyuyutʹ righteousness, toy chas, yak viryachy, yikhnya robota ne poyide vytratyty; my zapysuyemo tse
Tse zaboronyayetʹsya dlya budʹ-yakoyi spilʹnoty my vynyshchyly povernutysya
Ne do Gog ta Magog reappear, budutʹ vony todi vertayutʹ - vony prybudutʹ z kozhnoho napryamu
Tse - koly nemynuche prorotstvo prybude proyty, ta disbelievers bude stare u zhakhi: "Prykroshchi do nas; my buly oblivious. Diysno, my buly bezputnym
Vy ta idoly vy obozhnyuyete krim BOHA budete palyvo dlya Pekla; tse ye vasha nemynucha dolya
Yakshcho tse buly bohy, vony by ne zakinchylysya u Pekli. Vsi yoho meshkantsi perebuyutʹ u tse zavzhdy
Vony budutʹ zhurytysya ta stohin tam, ta vony budutʹ ne maty dostupu do budʹ-yakoyi novyny
Yak dlya tsykh khto zasluzhyly nashi rozkishni vynahorody, vony budutʹ zakhyshchatysya z tse
Vony ne pochuyutʹ yoho shyplyachi. Vony otrymayutʹ nasolodu vid abode de vony mozhutʹ otrymaty vse vony bazhayutʹ, zavzhdy
velykyy zhakh ne poturbuye yikh, ta anhely otrymayutʹ yikh joyfully: "Tse ye vash denʹ, shcho ye poobitsyanyy do vas
Na shcho denʹ, my zihnemo nebesa, lyubymo z·hynayuchi knyhy. Tilʹky tomu shcho my zapochatkuvaly pershe stvorennya, my povtorymo tse. Tse ye nasha obitsyanka; my zvychayno perevezemo tse
My ukhvalyly u Psalomakh, tak zhe, yak i u inshykh svyatykh pysanni, shcho zemlya povynna buty uspadkovana Moyim spravedlyvyy worshipers
Tse ye proholoshennya dlya lyudey shcho worshipers
My poslaly vam z myloserdya z nas do vsʹoho svitu
Proholoshuyu, "ya buv danyy bozhestvenne natkhnennya shcho vash boh ye odyn boh. Vy todi budete pidkoryatysya
Yakshcho vony prohanyayutʹ, todi kazhutʹ, "ya poperedyv vas dostatno, ta ya ne mayu ideyi yak skoro abo pizno (retribution) prybudu do vas
Vin znaye tsilkom vashi suspilʹni vyslovy, ta Vin znaye tsilkom vse vy prykhovuyete
Dlya vsʹoho shcho ya znayu, tsey svit ye test dlya vas, ta tymchasovoyi nasolody
Kazhutʹ, "Miy Lord, Vash vyrok yavlyaye soboyu absolyutnu spravedlyvistʹ. Nash Lord yavlyaye soboyu Naybilʹsh Dobrozychlyvyy; tilʹky Yoho dopomoha shukayetʹsya pered vashymy pretenziyamy
O lyudy, vy budete povaha vash Lord, dlya tremtyachoho Hodyny shchosʹ horrendous

denʹ vy svidok tse, navitʹ nyanchacha maty bude discard yi nemovlya, ta vahitna zhinka bude abort yi fetus. Vy pobachyte lyudey staggering, tak, yakby vony intoxicated, nezvazhayuchy na te, shcho vony ne intoxicated. Tse tomu, shcho BOZHYY retribution tak awesome
Sered lyudey, ye tsey khto sperechayutʹsya pro BOHA bez znannya, ta sliduyutʹ za kozhnym rebellious chortom
Tse ukhvalyuyetʹsya shcho budʹ khto khto z'yednuye sebe z nym, vin pryzvede do pomylky yo ta keruyutʹ yo do ahoniyi Pekla

O lyudy, yakshcho vy mayete budʹ-yakyy sumniv pro resurrection, (zapam'yatayete shcho) my utvoryly vas z pylu, ta z·hodom z tiny krapli, kotryy vertayetʹsya u vishayuchu (embryo), todi yomu staye fetus shcho dayetʹsya zhyttya abo vvazhayetʹsya bezzhyvna. My takym chynom roz'yasnyayemo rechi dlya vas. My rehulyuyemosʹ u wombs shchob ni my budemo dlya predetermined period. My todi prynosymo vam tomu shcho nemovlya, todi vy dosyahayete zrilosti. V toy chas, yak deyakyy z vy vmyrayete molodi, inshi zhyvutʹ do nayhirshoho viku, tilʹky znayty shcho ni bilʹshe znannya ne mozhutʹ buty dosyahnuti poza pevnoyu mezheyu. Takozh, vy dyvytesʹ na zemlyu shcho ye mertvi, todi yak tilʹky my zlyva tse z vodoyu, tse vibruye z zhyttyam ta vyroshchuye vsi riznovydy krasyvykh zavodiv
Tse dokazuye shcho BOH yavlyaye soboyu Pravdu, ta shcho Vin ozhyvaye mertvyy, ta shcho Vin Omnipotent
Ta shcho Hodyna prybuvaye, pevno pryblyzno tse, ta shcho BOH resurrects tsey khto ye u graves
Sered lyudey ye khto sperechayetʹsya pro BOHA bez znannya, ta bez kerivnytstva, ta bez vysvitlyuyuchoho svyatoho pysannya
Zukhvalo vin prahne vidvesty lyudey z shlyakhu BOHA. Vin takym chynom zaznaye prynyzhennya u tse zhyttya, ta my zdiysnyuyemo yoho na Dni Resurrection do ahoniyi horyachoyi
Tse ye yaki vashi ruky poslaly vpered dlya vas. BOH nikoly ne unjust do lyudey

Sered lyudey ye khto obozhnyuye BOHA umovno. Yakshcho rechi idutʹ yoho shlyakh, vin vmist. Ale yakshcho deyake neshchastya befalls yo, vin robytʹ pro-oblychchya. Otzhe, vin hubytʹ i tse zhyttya i U maybutnʹomu. Takyy yavlyaye soboyu realʹnu vtratu
Vin idolizes bilya BOHA shcho volodiye niyakoyu potuzhnistyu ne zavdaty shkody yomu abo yomu vyhody; takyy yavlyaye soboyu realʹnyy zbyvayuchyy z shlyakhu
Vin idolizes shcho bilʹshe pidkhozhyy zavdaty shkody yomu nizh yo vyhody. Shcho neshchasnyy lord! Shcho neshchasnyy kompanyon
BOH dopuskaye tsi khto vvazhayutʹ ta vedutʹ spravedlyve zhyttya u park z techuchymy potokamy. Vse ye z·hidno z BOZHYM bude

Yakshcho budʹ khto dumaye shcho BOH ne mozhe pidtrymaty yoho u tsʹomu zhytti ta u U maybutnʹomu, dozvolyayutʹ yomu povertayutʹ povnistyu (yoho creator u) nebesa, ta roz'yednuyutʹ (yoho zalezhnistʹ na budʹ khto shche). Vin todi pobachytʹ shcho tsey plan usuvaye budʹ shcho shcho turbuye yoho
My takym chynom vidkryly yasni vidkryttya herein, todi BOH keruye whoever wills (shchob keruvatysya)

Tsey khto vvazhayutʹ, tsey khto ye yevreysʹkyy, peretvoryuye, Khrystyyanyn, Zoroastrians, ta idol worshipers, BOH yavlyaye soboyu odyn khto bude pryymaty rishennya sered nykh na Dni Resurrection. BOH zasvidchuye vsi rechi

vy ne zdiysnyuyete shcho do BOHA prostrates kozhnyy u nebi ta zemli, ta sontsi, ta misyatsi, ta zirkakh, ta horakh, ta derevakh, ta tvarynakh, ta bahato lyudey? Bahato inshykh sered lyudey zdiysnyuyutʹsya shchob pryrikty. Whomever sorom BOHA, nikhto ne vshanuyutʹ yoho. Vse ye z·hidno z BOZHYM bude
Osʹ dva storin feuding shcho stosuyetʹsya yikhnʹoho Lorda. Yak dlya tsykh khto disbelieve, vony budutʹ maty odyah vohnyu tailored dlya nykh. Hellish ridkyy bude lytysya na vershyni yikhnikh holiv
Tse vyklykaye yikhni vnutrishnistʹ roztanuty, tak zhe, yak i yikhni shkury
Vony budutʹ obmezhuvatysya u zaliznykh horshchykakh
Koly zavhodno vony probuyutʹ do vykhodu take neshchastya, vony budutʹ prymushuvatysya nazad: "Pokusht ahoniyu horyachoyi
BOH dopustytʹ tsi khto vvazhayutʹ ta vedutʹ spravedlyve zhyttya u park z techuchymy potokamy. Vony budutʹ prykrashatysya tam z brasletamy zolota, ta perly, ta yikhniy odyah tam bude shovk
Vony keruvalysʹ do harnykh sliv; vony keruvalysʹ u shlyakhu naybilʹshoho Pokhvalenoho

Bezsumnivno, tsey khto disbelieve ta vidbyvayemo inshi z shlyakhu BOHA, ta z Svyashchennykh Masjid shcho my pryznachyly dlya vsikh lyudey - vmiyemo vony urodzhentsi abo vidviduvachi ta prahnutʹ zabrudnyty tse ta pidkupayutʹ tse, my budemo afflict yim z bolisnym retribution

My pryznacheni Abraham shchob vstanovyty Shrine: "Vy ne budete idolize budʹ- yakyy inshyy boh bilya Meni, ta ochyshchayete Miy shrine dlya tsykh khto vidviduyutʹ tse, tsey khto zhyvutʹ poblyzu yomu, ta tsey khto klanyayutʹsya ta prostrate

Ta proholoshuyutʹ shcho lyudy budutʹ zauvazhyty Hajj pilgrimage. Vony prybudutʹ do vas hulyayuchykh abo uvilʹnyuyuchykh na riznomanitnomu vysnazhenykh (zasoby perevezennya). Vony prybudutʹ z naydalʹshoho mistsya rozmishchennya

Vony mozhutʹ shukaty komertsiynykh vyhod, ta vony budutʹ svyatkuvaty BOZHU nazvu pid chas vstanovlenykh dniv dlya toho, shchob zabezpechuvaty yikh z domashnoyu khudoboyu. "Z'yizhte zvidty ta hoduyutʹ despondent ta bidnyy
Vony budutʹ zavershyty yikhni zobov'yazannya, fulfill yikhni vows, ta vidviduyutʹ starovynnyy shrine

Tsya kotra povaha obryady ukhvaleni BOHOM zasluzhyly harnu vynahorodu u yikhnʹomu Lordi. Vsiy domashniy khudobi robytʹsya zakonne dlya vashoho prodovolʹstva, krim dlya tsykh spetsialʹno zaboronenoho dlya vas. Vy budete unyknuty abomination idola obozhnyuyete, ta unykayete nosyatʹ nevirnoho svidka

Vy budete pidtrymaty vashu prysvyatu absolyutno do BOHA yedynoho. Budʹ khto khto vstanovlyuye budʹ-yakoho idola bilya BOHA vyhlyadaye yak odyn khto vpav z neba, todi pryyizhdzhaye skhvachenyy vultures, abo podutyy daleko vitrom u hlybokyy bayrak
Diysno, tsya kotra povaha obryady ukhvaleni BOHOM demonstruyutʹ righteousness yikhnikh serdenʹok
(domashna khudoba) zabezpechuyete vas z bahato vyhod na period, ranishe, nizh daruyusʹ do starovynnyy shrine

Dlya kozhnoho congregation my ukhvalyly obryady tym samym vony svyatkuyutʹ nazvu BOHA dlya toho, shchob zabezpechuvaty yikh z domashnoyu khudoboyu. Vash boh ta toy zhe boh; vy budete vsi pidkoryayetesya yomu. Dayte harna novyna slukhnyana

Vony yavlyayutʹ soboyu chyyi serdenʹka dryzhatʹ na z·haduyuchoho BOHA, vony steadfastly persevere pid chas neshchastya, vony zauvazhuyutʹ Kontaktni Molytvy (Salat), ta z nashykh umov yim, vony dayutʹ dobrodiynistʹ
